I got this for my mom's house and was surprised how easy it was to set up and make work over the internet with the app.  Much easier than my Ryobi garage door opener at my house.

Got this to pair up with my lift master and it worked pretty well. The installation was done in 10 mins and app was super easy, informative and guided the installation process beautifully. Very happy with the purchase.Update: bought another one for friend at $31 - wow. Its getting even sweeter.
Works great!  Exactly what I wanted. I always forget to close my garage door. I can close it from anywhere from now on!
Easy to install, but constantly is disconnecting from the My Q app on my iPhone, so I can’t open remotely.  I do not recommend buying.

I really like the function of this unit, but it would have been a lot better if it had come with instructions rather than a 'what's in the package'.  Thank heavens for YouTube.  It it least had clear, step-by-step instructions.  Haven't  tried Alexa with it yet.
Great device that exceeded expectations.  Very easy to install and after a couple months has worked flawlessly.  No more forgetting about garage door being open!

Ordered during Thanksgiving and set it up fairly quickly. Easy step by step walkthrough in the app. Be sure to have your tools and a ladder handy. Painless install. Gives me the luxury to open and close garage from my phone. Also gives peace of mind to check the status of your garage door. Amazon key deliveries also work. All my packages are dropped off in my garage. I now don't have to worry about packages getting stolen from my door step. Satisfied overall!

I am not a techie and when I made a mistake installing the controller, I phone Chamberlain's support line--and after a wait got a techie who was super patient and spent the time he needed to get the device working.  With his help, it does exactly as advertised.
Who would have thought that operating and monitoring a regular powered garage door remotely can be so easy! This product is ideal, installation child’s play and their instruction videos very helpful.

Easy to install and “learn” my garage door opener. App was easy to install as well and works great. I can now open my garage door from down the street so it’s all the way open by the time I get to the driveway.
They could not have made it any easier to install and setup.  Had it up and running in about 15 minutes and it works great!
Pairs easily with my 2.5GHZ Wifi (Xfinity) and seamlessly interfaces with Apple Home/Siri. I can monitor the status and control from the native app, Xfinity Home, and Apple Home apps.

This was easy to install, plug open app and follow the easy steps and your up and running.  love how I can open my garage at work if my family needs to leave something for me in my garage.  no more leaving pkgs on front porch.  😉

Installed on Oct 20, 2019. Easy to set up and program. After 3 days of use it stopped working and had to be reprogrammed. Has worked since then. Nov 10, 2019 MyQ reports the door sensor battery is low and needs replacing. I'll update this review later.
Unlike programming your garage door from your car visor switch, if they steal your car they still do not have access to your garage

Don't waste your time if you are a smart home enthusiast. The most you can do with this is open and close it, and be notified of an opening and closing, when far away. You can't ask any home app to "Open the garage door".
This product was very easy to configure and setup to my old Genie Garage Door.Now, I’m able to open my garage without having a line of sight and have deliveries drop my package while I’m not home.

After reading many reviews of successful installations and noting the helpful tips, I followed the installation instructions step by step and installed a TP-Link WiFi Extender in my garage. The MYQ-G0301 opened and closed the garage door one time. Now it will not close the door at all - it only opens the door. I've tried the suggested solutions with no luck. It beeps very loudly and flashes and eventually errors out. It was a great idea but it's going back to Amazon.

I can't express how furious I am after wasting my Saturday morning installing this worthless item that doesn't work with the Amazon smart home atmosphere, yet somehow is "recommended by amazon" - I repeat - DOESNT WORK WITH ALEXA! Who is buying this??????
Anybody who buys this and has problems with it may be caused by defective hub. Was nothing but trouble for weeks after I bought and installed it until finally they replaced hub. Now works great

I am always wondering if I closed the garage door after I leave my home.  With this product problem SOLVED!!  This is a great and easy to use product and a very reasonable price!! Would definately purchase again!!
Works great. Had to call tech support when pairing my garage but they had a solution right away. Love being able to open and close my garage door from my phone, watch, google home devices.

We bought this with the hopes that it would work with our 2 garage doors. We have a brand new home, builder put in Genie 1028 model. The model finder claimed this wouldn't work with them but low and behold, it does!
The item was easy to install and set up with our local network.  Finally peace of mind if the garage door is open or closed when away. Should have bought this years ago.
Very simple to install watching the quick video. Nice to have an app to look at when you can't remember whether or not you shut your garage door and you're on the other side of town.
This add on sensor will not work properly with my original door. When I open the new door BOTH doors open. When I close the new door BOTH doors close?

I install smartphone products for a living but this product is trash. Despite thousands of device installs on my record this product doesn’t work. Won’t pair consistently with my chamberlain opener from 2010, when it doesn’t pair it can’t tell if it’s open or closed. And I’ve had it auto delete it from my account 3 times now. Sending it back from where it came from. DO NOT BUY THIS! save yourself the hassle.
Installation video made installing very easy. It does require you to drill and screw attachment to wall or ceiling.  Also requires you to access your garage opener pairing button.

Set up was a breeze! All you have to do is install the app and follow the step by step instructions in the app. Installation of the hardware was also simple. Has worked flawlessly in opening and closing the door as well as giving a history of door openings and closings. I also installed the Amazon Key app to allow Amazon deliveries in the garage through MyQ.

Easy to install. App has functionality I was looking for. Using Google you have to say ok Google talk to my q and close garage or what ever command. Not just ok google close garage. And I guess do to some security thing you cant verbally use google to open it. You can go into the app though and click open.

The chamberlain myQ smart garage door opener is easy to install with the assistance of the YouTube video. Step by step instructions make it quick & simple. Now I have peace of mind knowing that once my family has left the house my phone gets a notification that the garage is closed.And if the kids try to sneak in through the garage late at night I’m notified of the time they arrive. :)

Love the convenience of this device.  Can open my garage from anywhere!!Update:  I still love the app but, every time the app updates you loose connection to the device and have to go through the connection procedure. 😡
This is one irritating piece of equipment. Will not stay connected to its own components let alone the wifi
It was physically simple to install but getting it wirelessly connected was a bit of a struggle.I was hoping it could be Alexa enabled to work from my Echo Auto, but no luck.

Constantly getting false alarms (95% false alarm rate). The one real time we left the garage door open, of course, no alarm. Thank goodness for the neighbor calling us at 1am to let us know the door was open.
I bought a hub with one door sensor, but I've got 2 doors I wanted to monitor.  I installed the hub and 2 sensors in about 15-20 minutes with no issues.  Quick and easy!

After I installed the chamberlain garage door opener this was a breeze to install and setup. Have not had a problem with it. I mostly use it from my phone to open the door when I am on my motorcycle. Plus i can monitor when my door opens and closes and how long its been since.

I’m one of those people that has had to turn around to go back home and make sure I shut the garage door.  I have called neighbors before to ask them to look out the window and make sure.  99 percent of the time, it’s shut, but it still drives me crazy.  Now I can look at my phone or my watch! I also set alerts to tell me when my garage door opens, closes, and when it’s been open for 10 minutes.  Easily installed and the app is user friendly.

Finally we can see if we left the garage open without having to turn around and go home to check.  The installation in the garage is pretty simple with the Velcro for the sensor and the hardware provided for the Hub.  The set-up was a bit awkward at first because my cellular data would cut out when I switched to the MyQ WiFi and therefore was unable to get to the proper set-up screens.  Tried a few things but eventually I deleted the app and reinstalled and then it was fine.

the button color on my motor wasn't shown, I had to call, but their hours are different than on the website, have model number handy when calling, after talking to the tech, I still had to try several times to get opener to accept the MyQ, it works fine now, be patient

It works but because it doesn't say how I almost didn't install it. I though it would have to connect to the button wire or something and when I didn't see instructions to do that I almost didn't install it.Turns out it uses the safety light sensors.
Had I known I could only add 3 people to the app, I wouldn't have bought this.  I have more than 3 people in my house!  What a stupid limitation.
Ok, some step been missing.  But with network knowledge u should be good. Took me abut 30 to 40 minutes the whole setup.  But as a right now,  bot complaints.  Works pretty good.
The product was easy to install if you follow instructions.  It’s a great took to help control the grarage door for package delivery, close door of left open, etc.  highly recommended.

Very easy to install. The alarm that goes off prior to the door closing is startling at first. I think the delay is a bit long but great feature.  I installed it within minutes. I however did not install the main hub on the ceiling because of lack of plug ins.

After reading this product was one of the most popular products on Prime Day I ordered it.  It has been everything and more that was written in the reviews.  It was easy to install and works effortlessly.  I have often driven out of the neighborhood wondering if I put down the garage door.  Now I get an alert when the door opens and closes.  Also, it is so nice to have the option to open and close the garage door from my app.  I love this product.  Would highly recommend to anyone!

I had some problems with the installation, for some reason even after I entered the serial number it would not read it. I called Chamberlain customer support 800-528-5880 And they were able to walk me through the installation. Works great now
Took hours to install and manual is not clear enough..terrible once installed shows random alerts..returning the junk..
Have you ever driven away and then wondered if you closed the garage? With this you can check remotely and have peace of mind! Affordable and relatively easy to install (love youtube).

MyQ is awesome. I purchased it instead of a replacement remote given the prices were about the same (when MyQ was on sale). It’s very easy to set up. But it is a little misleading that you also need to purchase a separate hi for the Alexa and HomeKit integration. Other than that, AmazonKey and regular app usage is awesome!
I'm so happy i bought this product. I can open my garage from my phone easily and I get notified when the garage door opens. Now my garage is smart and secured.
Easy to install and works well.  Allows you to transform a non-wifi opener into one at minimal cost.  There's an install video on YouTube from the manufacturer.  It's very helpful.

I’ve had this for a year and a half now, it basically has worked for about 3 weeks and then stopped. We’ve tried resetting and troubleshooting with the help of Chamberlain’s customer service team, we get it to work and then the next day it goes back to not working. We’ve tried their app on ios and android, we have excellent wifi connection, nothing fixes the problem. Waste of money.
Excellent buy for the money, only problem it wouldn’t work with my router. My router works on the ac protocol not b/g/n. I was really hoping it would work, definitely disappointed.

Bought this MyQ for my smaller garage to control and provide status on my existing garage door opener.  It compliments my new door opener with integrated MyQ we purchased last year.  It’s great to be able to check open/ close status through the MyQ App.
I have been using this garage opener for over 3 weeks.  for a product that's only twenty dollars and doesn't require an hub, this product is great.  Easy to install and dummie proof.

I couldn’t believe how easy the installation was. Place the sensor on the garage door, plug in the module, and then follow the instructions in the app.Our garage is on the opposite side of the house from the router (75ft or so) and the app showed full signal.

The instructions were easy to follow to connect to my Genie opener.  I have 4 bar WiFi signal and seems to function as intended.  The notification setup was easy too - I defined one for Open and one for Close.  I like the logging capability as well.  So far I'd recommend it.

Easy install and great to have control from phone. The deal breaker was the alarm tone when door closes. It was loud and annoying and kept going seven seconds after door had closed. There is no option to adjust or turn off. You have to open unit and remove speaker. Just google it. As a result I don’t use this any more.
Easy to install and setup. Took about 10 minutes to install and setup. It is great to check if I closed the door. I can also open it for guess and amazon. Works perfectly for me.
Been using this for 4 months and it has been flawless.  It connected and able to open garage door with less than 1 minute from open up the MyQ app on the phone.

Took just minutes to get it to work with my Craftsman opener. I have not had any trouble with it.Just a reminders that it does require a yearly subscription to get it to work with the google/IFTT and others. The MyQ app works just fine for me on its own.
Absolutely as my wife says the 2nd best toy I ever bought. Now when we say did we close the garage door we just look at the app, at home or anywhere,with WIFI. TERRFIC

I dont know whats up with all the the negative reviews. I am writing this review after using it for full month. Just bought a new house and i have 5 cars. Did not wanted to buy garage door opener for each car. This did the trick. Never had any issues.
This product works great but it needs to be made far more clear that this is only compatible with HomeKit with another $70 hub. Or better yet, make this device HomeKit compatible...

it was difficult at 1st to get synched up with my wifi and I almost returned it.  My last try I got it hooked up and glad I did as its an amazing device accurate and ver helpful.  Never have to worry if I left the garage up again.

This product does exactly what it is advertised to do. You can't say that much today. I bought this because a family member is elderly and sometimes forgets to close the garage door, and it's a great way to help her not worry about it. I am alerted every time the door opens, from wherever I am, and if it doesn't close in a timely fashion, I can close it. I supplemented it with an Amazon CloudCam so I can make sure I'm not closing the door on someone who needs it open. I highly recommend it.
Works exactly bad advertised.  I know open / close state of garage anywhere I am.Further, I setup a rule to close garage at 10pm incase I forget ..

Picked this up on prime day but even at full price this is good value for money. App is a little slow on opening. An open/close widget shortcut would be nice rather than opening the app, waiting for it to load before being able to open or close the garage. Would also be great if the LED light illuminated on opening for those times when the garage lights are out.

Worked well with no issues setting up, and  using Chamberlain app. I also made it work with HomeKit using the Homebridge app on a Raspberry Pi using the “Homebridge-Chamberlain” plugin. Added a second door sensor, also with no issues, just followed the instructions for iOS carefully

Installation is pretty easy, works very well with my smart phone.  I really like the fact I could check on the app to see if I closed the garage or not. It also is very handy when I'm outside working around the house.
Very easy to Install. Look no more than 10 mins to mount everything and get it synced. Very pleased with this and also at a great price. Honestly can’t beat it. Just wish it was Alexa intergraded.

The product / app is totally unreliable.  Sometimes it will work and sometimes it will not work—the worst of all digital worlds.  Installed well within distance/range specs.  Simply not worth using with something as important as access and security for your garage door.  Avoid!

This product works exactly as it should. The installation was easy. Setting up the WiFi connection failed 3 or 4 times before everything finally worked. Once everything is set up, the MyQ works great. I would give the product/app 5 stars except for the volume of the warning beep. It is ridiculously LOUD!

I love to be able to remotely open my garage door - especially when I have a delivery.  They go to my "Ring Video" doorbell - I tell them I'm busy, but they can slide it in under the garage door.  perfect!
Kept losing door sensors. I can't count the number of times I started all over and reprogram the unit. When it works, it's OK. When it's on sale it's a moderate value.
Boy is this worth it!  Heck yeah!  Rarely do you see a product live up to the hype, but this group by Chamberlain lives up and exceeds expectations.

Purchased item used from Amazon Warehouse and got it for a great price. Item was installed by myself fairly quickly 30 mins tops.  You would need a drill, screwdriver, ladder and wifi coverage that reaches your garage. You will also need to create an account from the MyQ app. So far so good. This item integrates into Xfinity Homes software which allows you to use that app to open an close your garage door. You can set alerts and push notifications from the MyQ app as well. Great buy overall.
Not direct integration with google home. Have to say “ok google, get myQ” then can talk to it. Hopefully this will change with updates. All other operation is great

I have tried to get this product working for two months. First the system said my wi-fi signal at the garage was too weak. I purchased a new mesh router with a satellite about 20 feet from the My Q receiver. Tried reinstalling, not a quick and easy process, only to be informed the system could/would not connect. Wasted my money on this one.

Very easy install. Biggest issue was getting connected to Wifi initially, but this was resolved through a little troubleshooting. This was a great upgrade that allows me to open my garage from my phone and I haven't had any issues with it working once it was setup.I definitely recommend this product for anyone that wants to remote open their garage or monitor it when away.

Couldn’t have been easier to set up. Now we can relax a little that this thing will notify us if we forget to close the door, and the remote function is simple and works. Very pleased with this product!
Didn't work with my craftsman garage door opener which is young enough per the manual. Tried other options following the customer support. Had to return it.

In my opinion, easy set up, just follow directions, I have an i-phone and supposively its harder to connect. didn't have any issues. works great and customize-able to show if doors open or closed and duration. We love it.

Super easy to set up, and works as advertised.  Some of the instructions (like how to set up multiple users on one account) are a little lacking, but it's not hard to figure out.  Definitely recommend it.
Like that you can set up to automatically close at certain time of day or night.  It's reassuring to know that at night my garage door is always closed in case I forgot to do.

Easy install. Watched the video and it looked simple and it was. Have a 20 year old Genie and it paired right away. Works great and notifications are nice. Have a Wink system and it works in the Wink app as well. Install took 15 minutes.
Oddly enough, Amazon delivery uses this device for key but integration with Alexa isn’t as elegant. There are ways via skills and IFTTT but nothing out of the box.

Works great. Control garage door anywhere. You can also schedule when the door will be open/closed. Alert feature is also sweet.  Alexa support will be sweet but lack of it is not a deal breaker to me. A great buy for <40$.

I bought this product to check remotely if my garage door was closed. It was easy to install. Everything you need is included (except ordinary hand tools) and everything was clearly marked. Chamberlain/Liftmaster has a very good video on their site and YouTube that you can easily follow. Just make sure you have a decent wifi signal in your garage.

All information here and on MyQ's website said it was compatible with my gate opener which opens from side to side.I found out it did not work on the last step of installation that it only works for residential garage doors that open vertically... I am sure it's a great product, but please make these things known ahead of time.

I bought this on PrimeDay for $25, which is cheaper than buying a new remote! Now I can let anybody, including Amazon delivery person, to access my garage door using their smartphone! This is the best gadget I bought this year. Super easy to install, works flawlessly, and most importantly, it simplified my life.

After unboxing set up was as simple as simple could be. Within minutes it was installed.  Then downloaded the Alexa key to set up scheduling so I dont have to worry about closing the door at night. You can still use your old garage door opener with this, along with your smartphone.  This little smart gadget definitely helps make life easier.
I already had the HUB set up for 1 garage. This was very easy to add to the 2nd garage.  Both work great and no issues.  Product works just like described.
System is very easy to install, all instructions in the app, control over phone is very cool.4 stars because I was not able to make google assistant work with this device.

Installation is very easy, no need to run cables from the hub to the sensor - they connect wirelessly. Installation will take 30 minutes or even less.I also liked the ability to configure alerts - i.e. if garage door is open for too long.
If you have a Genie or Overhead Door opener manufactured after 2006 this will not work. Their website says it's compatible, but the app and tech support says otherwise.
Bogus hub! Doesn’t work. It’s still assigned to the previous owners account. Spent over an hour with a Chamberalin rep who says the serial number needs to be deleted from the previous owners account.

I work on getting this thing programmed all day. Then went to the compatibility chart for garage doors openers.I have a new 2020 model. It says it will only work on garage door openers built before 2016.

I love the MyQ Smart Garage Door Opener and the Key in garage capability is the best.  There is nothing else I can say about this product!!!!!I hope Amazon and the other carriers will work together so, all deliveries can be delivered using the MyQ Smart Garage Door Opener.
Not only is this easy to install, I found out it works with my alarm company's hardware and alarm application so I can control it from there and see when it's closed. It gives good peace of mind.

After installation, had problems with door opening by itself. Contacted customer service and problem was resolved. Has been working fine since. Vgood price and works great. Two thumbs up (including customer service.)
I was able to wire this without the sensor since my opener was MyQ ready. Quick chat with customer service and they help my system get setup and running. Highly recommended.

Allows remote access to double check that you did indeed close the garage door when you left, and to close it if you did not. While it says it is HomePod compatible, you have to buy a separate bridge to access it. I knew that in advance, but still disappointed. I would give it 5 stars if it would directly connect with HomePod/iPhone/Apple TV so it could be part of my security screen.

So, you verify on-line that the unit is "compatible", install the system, opening all the packaging, affixing components to your door as directed, only to walk through the set-up process and be told "oh, well, it might not work. It'll tell you if the door is open or closed, but that's it." Trash. Don't waste your time or money.
Took less than an hour to setup with my Genie opener.That includes the smart-home setup and integration part.

Liked the ease of installation. Really hard to screw this up. I dont use Alexa so I cant review that portion; that being said, i do use Google. Not happy about the google voice integration as I hardly use Google voice and it was a bit of a hassle since I had to use a pc. I do use google home much more and there's no option to connect google home to the app or website.

Love it, it works great! Now I can see if my garage door is closed giving me peace of mind when I travel. If someone has left the door open, I can close it when I am away on a trip. I also keep a security camera in the garage as a double check incase there is something wrong with the sensor but after two months, I am very happy!!My phone now backs up as a remote control.

In three words, Awesome and Easy!  Instructions was very clear, very easy to integrate with MyQ app and great customer support if any questions or confusion. Strongly recommend to friends and others. Thanks MY Q.
Likes- Easy to install

I thought this would be a pain to install and assumed the small buttons replaced the garage door openers on the wall.  I'm handy so it wouldn't be a problem.  Turns out it wasn't that at all.  The installation was super easy and their app actually walked you through the whole process with photos and videos.  I wish everything came with instructions like the way they do it!!
I was a little nervous being a non-tech person, but the installation and setup took all of 10 minutes. Honestly super easy to get it going, and the app works wonderfully.
Work great when it works it loses it connection lot if you make sure you have a back up plans when it don’t work aka a 2nd remote controller to get in your garage you will be fine
Returned the product since it really only works with Chamberlain openers or close copies.  They also charge a monthly fee for the system.  Back two the Smart Things compatible remotes.

The integration with Google Home is TERRIBLE.  You have to say "Hey Google, talk to MyQ".  Google says okay.  They MyQ says "I'm MyQ, here is a list of things you can say (takes 10 seconds)".  And then you say "Close garage door" and half the time MyQ says "I'm sorry, I can't do that".  It's pretty worthless with Google Home.  App works well on your phone but there are much better devices that are seamless with Google Home.  May be returning it to get one of those cheaper ones.

I would never trust this product after getting home and garage door was opened.  We have setup 2 close schedules 9pm and 9am just to be safe that garage doors never left opened.  One time my wife left house at 8am  and came back at 9:30am and door was opened.  This product I can't trust to keep the garage door closed.  There were multiple times when door was closed and app was telling me it was open and vice-verse.

This is the best home improvement you can make if you have a garage door opener.  Sends an alert if I've left the door open and I can remote close (or open) from my phone.  Ever wake up in the middle of the night wondering if you left the garage door open?  Not any more.  Plus Amazon is talking about giving them a discreet code to open the door to deliver packages.
We are people who are sometimes have the unfortunate habit of leaving our garage door open. This app is a life saver! Easy to install, affordable, and easy to use.

Extremely easy to install! Works great, don’t know why the comments of difficulty, honestly, they couldn’t make it any easier to install. Just follow the in app My Q instructions - they even give videos!

Not sure what the negative reviews are about because I love mine. If you can read and follow directions, install is a breeze.  The alerts are a cool feature.  The only negative is lack of Alexa integration.

After quickly getting a replacement, found a few things interesting information about ensuring reliable operation is achieved. The most important is  proximity of the hub to the door sensor. Make sure nothing is blocking the line of sight between the hub to door sensor, hub is away from any electrical equipment (garage door opener unit), and at least 5 feet distance between the hub and door sensor.

When your battery dies on your push button device, or someone needs into your garage and you don't have an outside keypad, this opener is incredibly useful. Easy to pair, ALWAYS works when needed, and doesn't need anything but your phone to operate. No need to pay for extra devices when the app is all you need.
Ordered this from here 11 months ago. Just discovered it will no longer close my garage door remotely. I'll update when I see if the manufacturer is going to stand behind this product.

‪I’m very unsatisfied with Chamberlin/liftmaster myq remote garage door open used for Amazon secure home delivery service.‬‪I spent 3 1/2 hrs of an Electrican time and $$,  and 2 hrs of my time the following day to set up remote garage door opener w tech support. ‬Does not work

Final update:I got rid of this unit and replaced it with the NexxGarage which had worked like a dream.  Save yourself the time and aggravation and DO NOT buy this Chamberlain Opener. Read my full review below if you want to know my experiences with it.

This works with the Amazon key and all packages now get delivered inside the garage. No more driving around wondering if you left your garage door open. One look at the app and you know! Make sure you have a decent wifi signal in the garage though.
It works as described and it is easy to install.  I think the only thing they can do better to make it more sleek as I think there is a lot of empty space within the device.
This is a great addition to the garage door - easy to install, and good video's on you tube on how to do this.
I am always paranoid that I forgot to shut the garage and now I can always tell! Had a friend set up for me since I’m technically challenged, but once it was all set up it’s been super easy to use
I purchased this as a return to save some $$. It was so easy to hook up. No problems what so ever. It worked 100% of the time. I love it. Chamberland opener.
Product works great!Technical support is great!
Sometimes it works, sometimes it doesn't. Either the error code is wrong ie: the sensors are blocked when they're not or it says it's not responding when it worked a minute before.

Really easy to install. No wiring required at all. Took less than 20mins. Android app opens and closes garage door as well as gives me alerts if the garage door is opened for too long. I never have to worry about if I left the garage door open after I leave the house.

It has all the features I need in a remote door opener. I was able to watch for my package delivery and close the door when I received it. I use the Google Assistant and there is a subscription fee for that that I was not expecting, but it was cheap.

Extremely satisfied with this attachment. Adds a whole new level of convenience. App itself may not have many features but I’m reality you really only need what it offers. Notifications of garage being opened while your away makes for a nice safety and security feature. Purchased for $20, with a price point like that this product can’t be best. One last plus, ease of instillation took 15 minutes. Everything about this product screams seamless and convenience.
My only reason to get this was to integrate into my smart home. I have the Samsung smartthings hub and Alexa. Although they say it works with it..... Nope......
Item details claim it compatible with overhead door odyssy garage, but it doesn't work on it.Tried multiple times and returned

Had high expectations after reading some of the reviews. I checked and verified that my garage door opener was compatible (Chamberlain). Install was straight forward but just wouldn’t sync with the downloaded app on my iPhone.

Good product that is easy to install and very reliable. The only problem I’ve had is with the Apple Watch app the is quirky at times, so I can’t rely upon that in some cases.  The iPhone app always works, even if it occasionally throws an error when Internet is weak.

Really like being able to see the garage door status from anywhere. I would have given it 5 stars if I could control my door with Alexa (for free). Other than that it was very easy to install and the app works fine.

Doesn’t work with Genie doors made after 2016.  Have a new house and it does not work at all with my opener or door.  I contacted Genie support and they admitted that it does not work with Genie openers, like mine, manufactured after 2016.  Genie model 3024 and similar.

This device works perfectly, knows the position of the door (open or closed), sends me alert notifications when the door is left open. Only once did it get confused, and I’m not sure what happened to cause that.

Easy to install doesnt work with alexa. You have to jump through hoops to get it to work with Google.  Once you do google can only shut the garage not open it. There was no subscription fee they got rid of it . If you only want to control your door from your phone this is it.  If you want voice commands to work. Dont buy this
I wasn’t sure how this is going to work with our older Genie door opener. Took a chance.Install instructions on the app were easy to follow. Entire process took about 5 minutes. Highly recommend

If you're trying to make your garage door opener compatible with HomeKit, stay away from this!  I purchased this Hub from Amazon and had to get the HomeKit Home Bridge directly from Chamberlain.  I spent over two hours trying to get the two units to work together.  The instructions are very limited, but I followed them exactly as written (and tried multiple times).  That didn't work, so I went online and realized many more people have had issues with these products working together.  There were various suggestions that didn't work for me.  Judging by the comments on those sites, the suggestions didn't really work for anybody.When I thought there was no hope, I stumbled upon a YouTube video from Lance Scott.  He noted that the Liftmaster 888LM Wall Controller can serve as the hub and works with the Home Bridge.  I bought two of those controllers (needed to control two garage doors, whereas this would have only worked with one).  The installation of those controllers took less than 5 minutes, and it took only a couple more minutes to get the Home Bridge connected to them.

Excellent, easy to install, as advertise product, I will give it 5 stars if was able to work with Alexa, I just don't understand how come Amazon with able to open the garage door if we give them access for delivery BUT is not working with Alexa, hard to wrap me head around it, but maybe is coming soon, other than that, ITS AMAZING!
I bought this for a rental and follow the video and was super easy to install.  Works great if your garage door is not MyQ or wifi enabled.

Now I can open the door with a button on my phone instead of a button on a clicker. Google assistant can't open the door, other integrations with IFTTT can't open the door, Amazon Key can't open the door (in my area).I also had to break off the annoying beeping speaker inside the device just to tolerate using it.

Was a pain in the ass to connect to the garage door if on WiFi in any consistency.  Example if you were on your home Wi-Fi it wouldn’t work you always have to disconnect your home Wi-Fi to make the door open. Worked OK for about nine months and now has decided it should just up and die

After carefully following the instructions and starting from scratch again again, I finally had call the help number listed in the installation booklet (which thankfully hadn't changed) only to be told the directions that came with the unit were out of date. I was instructed to go to a web page that was nowhere listed in the instructions and to follow the web site guide to install the product.  Lots of frustration and wasted time on the phone. Could've at least put a sticker on the box telling me what was up. Pretty bush.

Crazy difficult to install and had to keep getting on chat to learn what should have been in the instructions. Works great now on one garage door but not the second one.  I wish it was made better even if cost more.

It was a waste of time and money getting this because if you live in a rural town like I do it will not work because we don't have Amazon delivery here just UPS. But it makes a good ornament in the garage.

I was hesitant to purchase a Wi-Fi enabled garage door opener because of the technical issues that could arise. The MyQ opener seemed to be fairly universal for application and I linked it to my 16 year old Genie opener. The instructions were very thorough and made installation a breeze. Unit was delivered within 24 hours and I had it installed and operation within 45 minutes. Could not have been any easier! Thanks Chamberlain!

Liked the instructions. Everything was easy to understand and straight forward.I have installed a good number of smart home devices in my home and this was by far one of the easiest and straight forward installations I have done. Everything came as expected and the instructions made the process very easy to follow.

I could never figure out how to operate it with Alexa App. Source was never found to add it.  It was also too loud when you closed it and no way to lower down the volume. Sometimes the connection had a lag.
Had to call a handyman to install, but I think a lot of people could probably have taken care of.Seems to work, which will be a great advantage.
This product was so well designed and easy to install that it should be used for all other Internet of Things as 'thee standard.' We were long overdue to adding this current piece of convenience.
Super easy to install. But I’ve been trapped outside about 3 times because it wouldn’t open. Otherwise works good. But never got Alexa to connect and control it.

This is a great way to take a basic old garage door opener and make it smart!  I have one of the Chamberlain Smart door openers, and this device took my other two door openers and made them just as smart.  They all work with the myQ app.  I set up alerts to let me know if the doors are left open too long, or if the door opens in the middle of the night.  I love this product.  It's a great investment at an inexpensive price.  Very easy to install and setup.

I had problems until I unwrapped the power cord lol I’m pretty sure it uses that for RF transmission! 100% reliability after I simply unwrapped it from the base! Heads up, the door sensor uses Bluetooth. Make sure to keep the main HUB in close connection with the Bluetooth door sensor and make sure your door goes completely vertical. A slight tilt will throw it off. Overall I love it! But the instructions are so dummed down... they will mess people up!

Unit was very easy to install. Having the garage door control on your phone is much more convenient than multiple clickers if you have multiple vehicles. The app is definitely glitchy especially when you are in a hurry. Overall it works as described. App needs a little work though.

I like this so much I bought an additional one for a friend. Love the ability to get notifications and know who is coming and going when I am away, the ability to schedule custom alerts (like: your garage door has been open for 5 minutes), and the ability to create custom schedules (like: if my garage door is still open by 9 p.m., close it for me).  I also bought 3 of the lighting modules and have various lamps throughout my house on the myQ schedule.  I even use them to control my Christmas Tree lights and Halloween Decorations. Looking forward to being able to participate in garage delivery as an Amazon Prime User!
Where we first installed it there was some interference with our WiFi signal. We’ve moved it and now works well but still it sometimes doesn’t make a connection. When it’s working it’s great

Works great and integrated with amazon for package delivery in the garage which was an unexpected bonus. The integration with google assistant is a little clunky - “hey google talk to myQ “ type clunky - other than that pretty cool add to my home automation

Love MyQ Smart Garage Door Opener works as advertised. I can open my garage to whom I'd like without giving out my code on the key pad and close it from anywhere. I never have to second guess whether I closed the door, I just look on my smart phone. Installation was very easy it took max. of 15 min.Joe
I kept accidentally leaving my garage door open and didn't know. Now I get a text alert when the door is left open. This was exactly what I needed. Super Easy to install.

This product is fairly easy to install, unfortunately it doesnt work.  Bought this so I could monitor and close my garage door if I forgot.  Only one problem.  This thing opens the garage door just fine but never closes it.  Install was done based on instructions and videos, but when hitting the close button all you get are lights and sounds - no movement.  Now I can see why the price dropped so dramatically.
Received smart hub today and installed it in about 20 minutes. No problems connecting at all. Works great.
Love it it is nice to be able to shut/open the garage door when we go for a walk or while working in the yard. App is easy to use and system is easy to install
Works great, but I have found the open/closed status is not 100% accurate.  Installing a camera with view of garage door to cover that issue.
This item worked for me for 2 months, then everything rebooted to factory setting. Reinstalled again but to no avail...i tried for so many times...hundreds maybe....i give up. Not worth the money.
If you have Google Home then DO NOT BUY THIS!  It does not work with Google Home well, requires special service agreement.  It works on with iPhone app and is easy yo install.  I would not buy again.

Easy, 20 minute install. App is pretty simple but works just fine.  I have 4 LED bulbs in my garage and didn't have any of the issues that other reviewerd had with them.Only downsides were the difficult to set up Google Home integration and the loud beeping noise when the door closes.
Easy to install!  We mounted the unit on the ceiling as directed.  Used this with our 14 year old craftsman garage door with no problem.  Integrated with xfinity easily.

Easy to install.  Instructions so simple they would work for a 2nd grader.  Learning process to remote control my Chamberlain Liftmaster was simple and worked well.  Very happy with alert notifications of door open and closed times.

Have not been able to get it to connect to wifi and I have a very strong signal in my garage. Even when I tested connecting inside my home it doesn't connect. I've attempted to chat and call customer service and I have had no luck with getting through.

It is an ok product. I wanted to get his o then I won’t have to buy garage remotes for all my cars but it doesn't work that well. The garage won’t close half of the time and the annoying beeping sound doesn't let me change the time. I got it just do then it looks cool to open it from your phone but it doesn't work very well. Works 5/10 quality.

Absolutely the biggest piece of garbage I’ve bought in some time to support smart home integration.  Our entire home is automated, lights, heating, security etc and installed by us. This was a missing piece and I will be roping it out and throwing it in the trash. The system continues to send falls notifications. Fortunately we’ve been home during this process. I can’t imagine being out of town and getting the false notifications we’ve gotten.  Don’t waste a dime on this product!

I suggest that you read and view ALL the instructions and video before you begin.  Everything worked as described and expected.  I had one question that I sent to Chamberlain customer support and received an answer within 12 hours.I have Genie door openers and it was no problem getting everything to communicate as required.  I have not set up Alexa with the product, as it is not needed.

This is an absolute POS.  Be warned, it does not function correctly.  I may have received a defective unit out of the box, but I was on hold with Chamberlain support for 47 minutes before hanging up.  I am a mechanical engineer and manage data centers for living, so I’m fairly technical.  This item is not worth your time.  I’ll look for a different manufacturer.

Being a person who regularly misplaces garage remote this is a godsend. Despite reading some tough reviews, I have found installation and set up was a breeze! I can't wait to try Amazon garage delivery( I hope they deliver if garage in in alley?). I love that I can see activity history(with remote it was easy to leave door open by accident). Also like the warning tone when door is closing for added safety,

I put off the installation, believing it would be troublesome.  But, surprisingly it was fairly simple.  I am real happy with the unit.  It gives me reassurance to be able to check the status of the door when away from home.  It is so simple to integrate, probably 30 minutes, taking your time.

No more turning around to go back and see if I remembered to close the garage door. No more getting out of a comfortable bed and walking across the house to check the door. I just grab my phone and it tells me the status of the door. Easy to install and set up. Chamberlain has very good product support and documentation on their web site. Make sure you check for compatibility with your opener.
Does not have real Google home/assistant integration. They count it as a premium service requiring monthly subscription. Not worth it.

So easy to install!  We bought our house 3 years ago, & our garage door opener never worked (despite all the YouTube tutorials we watched to reset it).  We used to have to go down the basement, into our attached garage to open the garage door.  Now this with cool gadget, we have our own remote on our phones. Love it!

This was very easy to install.  I did not need and additional parts or devices.  It has a fishing light and beeps as warning  prior to the door closing.  This can be used from my phone app and I was able to add my family to the app without ant issues.
This was super easy to install and works seamless with our Chamberlain garage door opener. Purchased a second one for our other garage door (we have an older home with two single garage doors).

Got it in, set it up.  Does not work with my garage door opener.  Really needed a solution.  Wish it would have worked.Did not realize it until it was installed, so there is sits in my garage, useless.
Does not work with google or AlexaDoesn’t work out of state

Unreliable garbage. I have spent multiple nights trying to set this up with my Lift Master only to have it fail to connect. This has been a waste of not only money, but more importantly,  my time. Don't waste either of yours.

This product was extremely simple to install and setup. It has its own app which work well but doesn’t currently work work Alexa. However, the work around is to use the SimpleCommands app and setup two routines in it, one to open the door and one to close the door. In the setup you also create your command line too such as “open garage” or “close garage”. Then after you set up your SimpleCommands skill in the Alexa app you’re good to go. “Alexa close garage” and it works.

Product was easy to install and works well on the Iphone.  My only complaint is that it does not work with Alexa.  Chamberlain wants you to pay a monthly service fee.  I am not aware of another product that doesnt work with Alexa for free.....what a ruse.

This is great. It notifies us if the door is left open and you can open or close it from the app. Also it lets you use amazon key- so Amazon can deliver in your garage. This has been awesome. No more stolen packages.We added a WiFi extender to the garage so it has strong WiFi. Instillation was easy.
the best gadget I bought this year. Had always been wondering if my garage door closed or not.  this device gives me peace of mind. I also love the feature which allows you to open it remotely.
Very easy to install and setup.  Unboxed and had up and running in less than 1/2 hour.  Self explanatory on what to do.  Have not set up Alexa, so can't comment on that part.

Would not connect to my garage at first. Had to delete the hardware (install of unit) and start over. Connected immediately after that. Love having packages deliver to my garage, and not sitting by my front door.
I had no issues installing the device or linking it to my WiFi or to the configuration app. The device has worked as expected thus far. I have not tried any Alexa integrations.

Notifies me when door is opened and closed.  Notifies when left open after specified time. Closes automatically at set time.This is definitely one of the top smart device anyone with a garage can own.

A well thought out product. Worked flawlessly with my older, non MyQ, Craftsman garage door opener. Kudos for a very good software app. I have not added any more IOT items at this time. Nice to know that if I forget to close the automation in the schedule will fix that plus I have a secondary way to open the garage...

After a week, it operates flawlessly. Using it is a pain because  of the time it takes to log into the app and tap the open/close functions while I am still driving towards the garage. This can be solved by using the Hey SIRI features, but there is no way I am going to blow $70 and a subscription for the Apple Home gadget just for that. Hint: You can avoid this by finding manual SIRI command scripts, and when you load them you can assign whatever voice command you want.

Turning your garage door into a smart garage door must be complicated and expensive, right? Nope! Set up with my existing opener was a breeze, I can still use my old remote from my car, but now I can also use my phone or smart home system, always see whether my garage door is open or closed, control it from anywhere, and build it into my life automation with ifttt etc. This is awesome!

Works great. I did not integrate with Alexa and primarily wanted this to be monitor my garage door remotely. For that reason it’s a great device!  also works well with amazon in garage delivery. No fees with this setup.

I bought this because I got excited about the possibilities of adding to my smart home. Unfortunately the attached adapter isn't compatible with all garage door openers, so check compatibility before you buy.

Had the MyQ hub and sensor installed on one garage door.  Worked well enough, so I bought this sensor for the other door. However, no matter what I did it would not connect to the hub.  I called tech support after many attempts and their response was just to follow the (non-working) setup procedure and then say that it's probably not working right because I bought one off Amazon.  Then they left me hanging.
It took some time to get this set up but once you get it installed and set up on your phone it works great I’m glad I got it now!
This is very specific to what openers it works with.  I got it and it didn't work and then couldn't return it.

It was really easy to setup and instructions are very helpful. It took less than 20 mins to complete the setup. Hub to garage motor pairing worked way smooth than I was anticipating. My only reason for 4 star (not 5) is due to initial glitch in sensor to hub pairing.  I didn’t do anything specifically but it started working as normal from second day onwards. So far the product is exactly what I was expecting.
Great gift for my hubby. He loves it. Couldn't greet to the treasure truck location to purchase, paid a little more online at Amazon. Easy to install. Works great.

Super cool. Download the app, follow the 4 steps, installed. Already have had a few garage deliveries. Have the cloud cam hooked up and can see the drop off live or watch it later. Get notified every step of the way
This was so easy to set up and install. It gives me peace of mind to know I don’t have to turn around whenever I think I left my garage open (even tho I haven’t yet).

Easy to add to existing opener. Easy setup. Works well. Now when we're hundreds of miles away and wife says "Did you close the garage door?", I can show her the app and reassure  her. Worth the cost for that alone!
Must have. So easy to install and set up. Sends a text when open or closed. Bought 2 for and each work great.
Great gadget, use it all the time to open and close the garage from my phone while I am working in the yard. Setup was easy.
Easy to install through the app. However, it does not integrate to Google Home without a premium subscription. You can add it to Amazon Key, but there isn’t a skill on Alexa.

The door sensor fails to report the status change now and then, resulting in false “open” notifications. I got this to have peace of mind that I closed the garage. It defeats the purpose if it is unreliable.

Garbage.  Works about half the time.  Always going offline.  It tells me it is open when it is closed and vice versa.  Save yourself the headache and pass on this device.  It is not worth the frustration.
Easy installation and set up, took maybe 10 minutes to do taking my time. Works perfectly, no issues.
It worked great to me. I have a bluetooth opener from different brand, and this wifi opener is more responsive and cheaper.
It was stupid simple to set up.  The walk through on the app was fantastic.  It took me longer to put the screw in the ceiling than it did hook up to WiFi. Works great on the app

Who hasn't left the house or gone to bed and wondered if they forgot to close the garage door?  This happens to me all the time.  Now I can open and close my garage door with the app, from anywhere in the world!  And it will inform me if my door is opened or closed, and it will even say how long the door has been open or shut.
Installation was simple. Compatibility wasn't there, and I ended up returning it. Instead went with a Homekit product from a blue/yellow big box store.
Installation was simple. Compatibility wasn't there, and I ended up returning it. Instead went with a Homekit product from a blue/yellow big box store.

It took a few try’s to connect up with my garage door opener (it’s a Genie) but after I got it connected up it worked perfect. My wife downloaded the app on her phone and I sent her the invite and hers works perfect too!! So we love it!
So setup was on the rough side. App not cooperating, I had an issue with my router(my concern). But all in all once it is setup working flawlessly! Great addition to the smart home, would recommend.
If you ever drive away wondering if you closed the garage and you have an old garage door opener, this is a perfect product for you!!!!!!  with the APP and the notifications its the perfect fit!
This product saved my life. Took about 5 min to install. I got two for both my garages and it works perfectly. Awesome product to turn your garage opener into a smart garage.

Works as intended, but overpriced for what it is. If you use Apple HomeKit don’t bother. They have a new version that integrates with HomeKit, this DOES NOT. Overall it was easy to setup (less than 30 minutes) and it works well, but I would not pay full price for it and I would not have bought this version had I realized there was a newer version that integrates with HomeKit.
Super easy to install and works great. Been waiting for a long time for a lower price and it finally came down to a great price point. 30 minute install and good to go.
I was able to install it by myself. It’s super easy to do and great to have. I don’t have to carry my key house with me when I go for a walk, just open the garage through my app!

Well, I've installed it December 2019 and it has worked very well so far. Coincidentally my daughter left the garage door open the same evening it was installed and I was able to lay in my bed and close it. No issues and I don't expect any either. You just have to make sure your WiFi strength is very good that's it. No more wondering if I closed the garage door or not.

Simple to install. Fairly simple to configure, which is good, because these things are constantly forgetting they are already setup, can’t tell if the door is up or down, and needing me to go through setup and config over and over. Not worth the price.

Great value! The price was very affordable and it does just what I needed. Now I don’t need to worry about forgetting to close my garage over night and now I can integrate with IFFT so it opens and closes automatically as I arrive or leave home

Took about 1 1/2 hour to set up. Directions suck! No Alexa support but works through IFTTT. The big let down so far has been install instructions. They’re not the best. Luckily I had to reprogram my remotes last year and remembered a few things and figured it out.

In order to make life more convenient, I bought it online. After receiving the goods, I was really moved. With the progress of the times, a small box can control the switch. After connecting to the network, the mobile phone can also be operated remotely. When I put this thing in, it was still very difficult. It may be for me, so I let my children do it for me. It's too easy for them. Technology really makes life easier.
Have several. Paid 5-6x the latest prices for the first ones. Can support multiple doors at same location. Incredible how much the prices have come down on these.

If your looking for a standalone remote opener that will work on your phone with the MyQ app, then this may be for you.  If you want to Alexa, or Siri so you can open and close your garage door, look at other products because this product wont do.  Looks like maybe you could spend even more money and by a bridge too, but then, still wont work with Alexa.  I'd return it by the return window has closed.

Instructions are not included, at least ones that work. However I called support they were quick to answer and walked me through the process very quickly. Love this unit. Put the app on my phone a my wife’s works great
very nice product. Can monitor and control my garage door from my cell phone no matter where I am as long as I can access Internet. Will send out alert if the alarm rule I set is met.

The only feature I wish this had is a geofence  feature so the garage would open automatically when you come home.Also , the Google Assistant integration is terrible. You always have to say "talk to MyQ" first, then you can give a command. Very cumbersome.
Like everything about it except the flexibility of its automation.  It doesn’t allow me to automatically open it upon arriving, a feature I was expecting.
Took me like 15 minutes to install. The web app shows you every step. Great and inexpensive product. This thing regularly goes on sale to like $30. 10/10 would buy again.
Easy to install and use. Would be better if could come with ability to tie into Google without subscription.
This is such a cool product. Works with my (very old) garage door, (which we couldn’t purchase a compatible remote for). This works great & replaces the need for an added remote.

This product does not work for my situation whether it be the product itself or my garage door opener. It does not pair up even though my opener is listed as compatible. Additionally, the sensor and hub lose connection and the app inaccurately displays door position. The first night I installed it my app told me it was closed but actually it was open all night long.
Works great.  Set up was good enough- not too difficult, but took multiple attempts/ but less than some items I have worked with.  It has not lost connection in the first six months.
If you’re like me, then you have a regular garage opener that works well; however, recently I have a need to be able to open my garage remotely to allow family / friends into the garage.Observations:
Just wish it had a timer to close the door like there previous model. Really miss that feature. I believe might happen with a software update.
Very easy to install, and provides peace of mind when you leave the house in a rush.  No more worrying if you forgot to shut the garage door.
Get timely notification on my phone and worth of investment...Awesome...saved me to close many times... worth of investment...

This product is already well known for it's added convenience to opening or closing your garage door remotely from anywhere. Follow the video instructions embedded into the app, ensures easy installation.
Great product. Connected to our phones via the app. Makes it Easy to know when our teenagers are coming and going :)
The product should contain a list of compatible door opener that works with it for opening using the app.Had to return it as all it could do was tell me if the door is open or not.
Works great so far. Installation took about 20 minute. The app walks you through it. There is a small delay with the notification feature, but it still works. Great little product overall.
Works well.  I did not integrate with any home automation.  Just cell phone control and notification.  No issues installing and adding to the home wifi.
Had trouble with the first unit. Contact service they sent me a new one asap. Installed ,  returned the old one. All working great!

Great product! now I don't have to worry if my husband or I forget to close our garage door.  I only put 4 stars because MyQ App is annoying most of the time it ask for password although the "remember is on" and it  takes a while to open.

I love this thing, simple to install, simple to use. The only problem I have with it is more a problem with amazon than this product. Amazon doesn't deliver packages inside in my city, that was one of the main reasons I bought this was for a bit of peace of mind that my packages won't get stolen off my porch, but come to find out amazon doesn't do the in-garage delivery for MOST cities. I would double check through Amazon if that's the reason you're buying this like I was

For a "smart" garage door system it's pretty useless. It's app-controlled sure, but not smart. Connecting it IFTTT (which by the way is a subscription "premium" feature) only allows you to view status or close the door.  No google home support. Also it's super ugly. Save your money.
Great product. Installation was simple. Took less than 5 minutes, start to finish. Install and set up instructions very clear,Nice item works as it is supposed to, app easy to setup and use.
I am able to turn it on from far away or near my home.  It never fails me.  I no longer need to worry if i forget or lose my garage opener.

This product is garbage. Installed, worked fine for a day, then would not recognize from the app a few times before I returned. Followed troubleshooting instructions for each. Not worth the risk of getting home and being locked out and spending 20 minutes to sort every couple days...did this 3 times in a 4 day period
It took less than 15 minutes to install. Hardest part, was getting the ladder out. Just follow the step by step and you should be fine.
Not super impressed.Love the price.

I am very satisfied with this product.  Installation was simple, however setup proved a bit of a challenge, all credit to operator headspace and timing.  The phone technical support was amazing and the rep patiently guided me through setup, which is simple enough IF you simply follow the instructions.  The is a great value for the price.  I have not tried the Key feature for delivery, but that’s an added bonus.

Does not work with Genie Model 3024. Wasted many hours trying to pair this. One page on website says models after 199x are supported . But after a lot of digging found a page which says Genie models manufactured after 2016 are not supported.Wish this worked. Will have to look for another that works with Genie 3024.
There is no way to tell alexa to shut garage door or ask if the door is open (without IFFT).  Not impressed.

I’m a pretty tech savvy person and this just wouldn’t work for me.  Seemingly nice step-by-step instructions but if something hangs up, you’re stuck. I’ve tried to “factory reset” several times per the online support but now I cannot get past a certain step and it basically a very light paper weight.  Can’t return it because the packaging was tossed.  $40 circling the drain.  Be wary.

Great value for this product. Easy to install and setup. My garage door opener is an old Craftsman and rather than paying for a new opener, I just bought this and now my wife and I are able to open our door with our phones. I did have to buy a WiFi range extender since our router is far enough away, but that was also very easy to setup.
I love it, I wished I knew about this before. Easy to install, works great. I didn’t connect with amazon key. No more Struggle trying to remember if the garage door is closed.

I am extremely disappointed with the product as it does not work with google home and only works with google assistant. I use google home for all my smart home functions. Just to use this device I need to use 3 apps now or switch everything to alexa :(

I purchased this unit, not knowing if it would work with my Linear garage door openers or not, but it works flawlessly.  It is nice having the comfort of knowing when my garage doors are opened and closed.  The alerts give me peace of mind.

I found the setup to be extremely difficult, and I cant get it to control my "compatible" garage door openers.  I cant recommend this product to anyone.  I look forward to any product from Ring, Nest, Amazon, Google, etc. that can replace this.
This took maybe 2 minutes to unpack, install and add to my existing setup. Worked on first try. Awesome.
After being told it would work by factory help desk with my Quantum opener; did it not workI had to return it

Set up is a bit clumsy could be improved the iOS interface is OK wish you had a Apple Watch applet and that it worked with Alexa voice and Siri sure you could give it a voice command from Apple CarPlay
So far so good.  Works in every way we'd hoped it would.  Only difficulty is having to attach to garage ceiling.  Would be nice if a simpler way was available.

Great product. Just wish the product would be offered as a bundle package for 2 garage doors. Needs to be clear the product will support more than one garage door, just purchase another door sensor. Works as advertised, alerting me to when the garage door is left opened.

App works well, easy to share enter when guests visit, since can use phone no longer have security risk of garage remote all the time. Wish it had a stronger signal as I have to be close to garage door, but that's probably my router

Slow to respond with door position on 4G. Status shows closed when open and open when closed. When door showed open and crashes app when trying to close. Had to send friend to house to close manually. Reinstalled with tech support no improvement.  Door showed open and  returned to find door closed.  I can not trust the control to work reliable.

I BOUGHT THIS AS A WAY TO TELL FROM INSIDE MY HOUSE, IF I HAD LEFT THE GARAGE DOOR OPEN.  ALL THIS SEEMS TO DO IS TELL ME WHEN THE DOOR HAS BEEN CLOSED FOR A SET TIME, OR OPEN FOR A SET TIME.  IF YOU USE THE APP ON YOUR PHONE, IF YOU BARELY TAP IT, IT WILL OPEN OR CLOSE YOUR DOOR.  I GET RANDOM MESSAGES THAT MY GARAGE DOOR IS OPEN, BUT WHEN I DRIVE HOME TO CHECK, IT'S CLOSED.  I WOULD NOT RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT.
Works flawlessly. I have installed 2 sets for 2 garage doors using one hub. I love being able to open and close the garage remotely.
Easy to install and program. Ability to close door automatically if remained open at certain time. I can check if the door is open from App and close it from anywhere

The Installation was super simple once I had tech support help me. They have excellent tech support that is really familiar with the product and setup. I kept getting stuck at a certain point in the installation and came to find out it was because the app was getting hung but the installation had succeeded anyway. The TS guy spent 5 minutes on the phone with me and I was up and running. Save yourself time and just call them if you get stuck on anything.  They are great.
We love, love, love the MyQ Smart Garage Door Opener!!!No more wondering if we shut the garage door. Now we know if the door is opened - and when. We can monitor when someone gets home, or leaves.

Easy to install.  Works well but to integrate with alexa they charge a fee.  Also wanted to add a second sensor for the other garage door but it costs almost as much as the whole system...that is a ripoff.

It was easy to install and setup. BUT, it doesn't work. It opens the garage door randomly, says the garage door is closed when it's actually open. I was really hoping I could use this product. Unfortunately, I will return it.

Before you purchase this, make sure that your opener is blue tooth capable. The manufacture does not tell you up front that if your opener is manufactured before 1993, it may not work.  You have to open a PDF document to find the fine print.

This thing is a great addition to any home! It was super easy to install and works great. Its awesome being able to make sure the door is closed when you are away or let a friend in. Works great with other smart home devices. Chamberlain no longer requires the $10 a year for it to work with Alexa or Google which was a nice suprise!
I am always forgetting to shut the garage door, now I can close it from work and see whether it’s open from miles away.  Works with my smart watch, too.
MyQ smart garage door opener monitors and gives peace of mind as advertised.  I can control it with my smart phone and it works great for me. I was not looking for total smart home integration.
Turned my 15 year old garage door opener to a wifi compatible new device. app works very well! Great product!

It's a great garage opener. When you not sure if you closed the door you can check the app and you know it. You get the alarm right away when it's open or closed. Sometimes it will disconnect but I think it's due to Wi-Fi connection.

Why did I wait so long to buy this, it is perfect if you ever ask yourself the question "Did I close the garage door?" Just open the app and you can see if you did or not. If not, touch a button to close it from anywhere. What more could you ask for?
If you follow all directions exactly as written, it is very easy to install.  Took me less than 30 minutes.

After reading many reviews, I was a bit nervous to purchase this at the suspiciously LOW price and potentially have to endure an insanely difficult installation.  I am very pleased to report that it took longer to open the package and download the app than it did to install the system. It works EXACTLY as described.  If you're thinking of purchasing this device, my advice is to simply follow the instructions, watch the videos as directed and don't move forward without completing each step.
Easy install. Great features. But would like it to work with Alexa (of course w/some sort of security). Hoping it does in the future and if so, I'll change to 5 stars.

I used this product for 2 garage door openers.  At first I had trouble setting it up.  When I would press learn on the garage door opener, the motor learn would time out before the wireless hub would find it.  To solve that, I would watch the light on the garage door opener and hit the learn button again while the wireless hub was searching for it.Overall - works great as in intended and now I can monitor my doors and also get alerts if someone tries to open the door during the night hours.

This only works half the time. Notifications are very late and sometimes gives you wrong information. It's says close when open or vice versa. Sometimes when it says it's open and you close it with the app it actually opens it leaving the garage door wide open for the intruders.

Installation was relatively easy except for some confusion between the color of the programming button and the led light it controls. Once that was corrected with Wanda over the chat network at Chamberlain everything went smoothly.  We have a place at the shore and another home and we are always between one or the other. Now we can rest assured that the door is closed and know when anyone opens it and when.The "MyQ" app is great and all  I still need to do is add it to the Google home.

I bought this device to work with my Chamberlain garage door opener. It is a lot more reliable than the HomeLink button in my car, and it's nice I can raise/lower/and check the status of my garaged door when I am away from my house.

I installed this product to keep track of our garage door.. We live in rural and sometimes for whatever reason the garage door doesnt get closed.. Can monitor it and close or open from wherever.. Easy install in less then 30 minutes if you get all your tools ahead of time and watch the youtube video before you begin.. Great Product..
Easy enough to install.Update; constantly errors and no matter how good the WiFi is it fails.  G a r b a g e
Love this product. I always hard time remembering if i close the garage thanks to these one check away. Always updated when open and close the garage. Even the history.
Love this , now have a camera in the Garage that Also got from Amazon. Now I know who goes in my garage. & I can open it 1000 miles away & close it!! Amazing! Love it !!
This thing loses communication and doesn't work more than it actually works. Seems everyone has a similar problem. No Alexa integration also a huge downside.

It’s just one of those things that I appreciate now that I have it than before I bought it.  My garage is detached from my house and is a good 200’-0” from the router.  It was still able to pick up a weak signal and I’ve been able to use it just fine.
Works as its supposed to I can control garage with phone or by voice with alexa using iftt. I dont have to worry about garage being left open by mistake.

Chamberlain has had to keep cutting the price of this item because no one will buy it, and for good reason. You cannot open the garage with this opener, it only closes the garage and checks whether or not it's closed. Integrating with Google or Alexa requires a "premium" subscription, which they recently reduced to $0/month because no one was willing to pay for it. I thought it was a good deal at $30 but it turned out to be a waste of my money.

I just had a friend ask if I could drive over to his house and check to see if his garage door was closed. He wasn't able to do himself and no other way to check. Its these kinds of moments that makes the purchase of the Chamberlain MyQ Smart Garage Opener worth buying. It gives the peace of mind to check and remotely operate your garage door from anywhere.
Bought for Alexa integration as advertised; however, it does not support use of Alexa. Furthermore, it takes almost a :30 to respond once triggered via iPhone.
Easy to install.  Randomly tells us the garage has bee open for 30min.  When it’s not.  Kinda defeats the purpose.  Seems the sensor for the garage door is janky!
like-the ability to control police or fire to enter house using my iPhone in case of emergency
Works great. Easy to install and to connect to wifi. I like the notification settings options.
This device has made life a lot easier! I love that it gives the ability to monitor your home with kids coming and going. You can also grant access to visitors if needed, awesome tool.

Super easy for first garage door.  Second door not so easy and not separating the doors to operate individually and horrible instructions included with second sensor.  Need to call Chamberlain today to figure out the problem.

I love it!  One concern is troubleshooting pages did not cover enough issues. I had to read different forums to find out that the LED bulb in my garage door opener was causing interference with connectivity.  Changed bulb and worked great.
Easy to install. I don’t understand how anyone had issues.Only thing that I don’t like it the flashing lights and beeps when you open or close from the app

Very Please!  This product did exactly what I expected and was fairly easy to install.  For the price, the added control and altering is very useful.  The instructions are very good, and thorough, but I could see that an overview of the parts and operation would be useful, in case you have a problem.For the price, this device is really useful and more than worth the money.

Only reason I didn’t give it five stars was I had a firmware issue that I had to wait for about twenty minutes for devise to resolve. It could not find and communicate with my opener (craftsman) until it updates. Which it did by itself after being connected to my network for about twenty minutes. Other than that it installed as easily as directions said it would and works perfectly. I have already opened and closed it from 150 miles away  It is awesome to have this type of controlHave not connected to Alexa

This is a cool idea if it worked all the time. Several times my app says the garage is open and in reality it is closed. I do not trust it 100%. It is great if I am standing there to see it, but is I am at work I would like to twist it.

This is a great product. It was very easy to install and gives me peace of mind knowing that I can check to see if it is open or closed while I'm not home.The only reason for my 4 stars is because the "low battery" won't go away, even after we have replaced the battery. We followed all the directions and got the correct battery.

Installed and worked as described. The only issue is the video set up and install instructions reload to the start when. You pause to perform a step. Otherwise it is a great product. Saves me time when I forget to close the garage. No more turning around and going back to the house.

There were no instructions in the box, however the app guides you through the installation process. mine was a little tricky because my garage door opener is made by "Python" sold by Sears. Python is not on the compatibility list. upon further investigation I found out that python is made by "Genie". installed it as a genie. works perfect.
