Very easy to install. Took me longer to find my tools and step ladder then the actual installation.  For anyone saying its difficult they are either not compatible with the opener or just not following directions.
Although the product claims to be compatible with the Overhead Door Legacy 650 it absolutely is not

Easy to follow instructions and the hardware install was painless. Wife and I now can both open the garage door remotely and we will get notified if the door has been opened or closed when we're not home.....great price too.
Battery lasts about 9 mo. and will send a low battery alert at any time of day, even 2:00 AM.

Easy install. It took about 25 minutes from opening the package to being done.  Install the app and follow the instructions. I could do away with the beeping sound when it closes, but I guess safety is somewhat important.
This product has so much potential, just needs better integration to existing systems (iCloud, CarPlay, etc.).  Extremely easy to install with great step by step instructions.  It works!

Was hard to connect took number of trues called told yo try the purple instead of orange.  Now number of times it goes off line says it cannot connect with server do have to get out of car unlock front door go into house and manually open the door.

After initially getting this installed the Chamberlain Smart Garage Hub wiped out the capabilities of the car Homelink remotes and even the small remotes that came with the garage door opener. To make matter worse, now my garage door won't go down unless you hold the wall panel door the entire time the door is dropping or it goes back up - it was lobotomized by the Garage Hub! I wouldn't recommend this to my worst enemy after wasting an entire afternoon messing with this.
If you want to control all your smart home systems from one place, look elsewhere. Chamberlain will nickel and dime you by charging a subscription fee for simple integrations.

I got this on Amazon Prime Day - so, it was a great deal . . . I bought it mainly to be able to open and close the door when I leave and return on my Harley.  It works really well - very happy with the product.  One thing make sure you mount the HUB at least 4 feet from your garage opener - it will function much better.  Some people complain about you have to pay a fee for whatever  . . . I use it primarily as stated above - no fee - does what it is supposed to . .  enjoy!!
This is so nice if you sometimes forget to close your garage door... which i do.  So my husband wanted one of these and they work great and was easy to install.

I rarely write a review. However, this is one of the few times I have been overly impressed on how this product installed with a step by step instruction, both with video and manual, on installing and activating this Garage Door product. Very impressed. Wish more companies would follow their example.
Simple function app but I wish I had done this years ago! I use this constantly to check whether or not my garage door is closed.
Half works when it wants to usually the amazon ppl have to reset it when opening my garage but I still love the ability to open the garage via my phone still boss
The software adds great features. You not only can control your door, you also know where it is.
I love it I use it to open my garage door to receive packages. You have to have a good WiFi signal in your garage for it to work
It will not sync to my garage but at least the alerts when opening and closing would be nice but, it only works like 15% of the time. Soooo not worth it

This product does not come with a manual. After you download and install the app on your phone, you don't need one! It took me about 30 minutes to install, and it works great. No more turning around to go back and make sure the garage door got closed.

It doesn't say on Amazon or in the Instructions that you need internet for this to work.Even though your "mobile device" and the myQ are on the same WiFi network, they will not talk without your WiFi router being connected to the internet.

Works great except for the second garage door close to my malibu lights will not open at night. Some how the signal is being blocked, but otherwise works great. The alarm is a little annoying also when it closes.

When it works, it's fine, however it disconnects frequently and is a MASSIVE pain to setup (on Android). They frequently push updates that break the app, and is an all around mess. YMMV, esp if you have an iPhone but it's a constant source of annoyance to me. Unfortunately the last update broke after my return period ended so I'm stuck with this.

This was something that I really needed.  I was calling my neighbor to close my garage door or to check and see if I closed the garage door now I just pull out my smart phone open my app and see if its closed it not I can do it from anywhere.
It is super easy to install and works like a champion.  I no longer have to worry about IF I closed the garage before bedtime.  It does it for me!

It didnt work with my genie garage door opener even though chamberlin showing compatible. After multiple attempts programmed successfully, but not functioning (neither open nor close) thru app. Chamberlin tech support mentioned that MyQ is not compatible with latest Genie model ( from 2016), and tech support team doesn't have enough knowledge to trouble shoot other than explaining FAQs. Really frustrated.

This has been the worst purchase I've made through Amazon Never ever did it work right constantly would not open when I tried with the app. Finally I bought a different brand nexx And it works perfect all the time easy to hook up
I am pretty impressed! It was a simple 20 minute install, and works as it should. It stopped working once, so I reset my wifi router, and it has worked perfect ever since.
“When” it works, it’s amazing. However this thing is offline more than it is online (with NO problems with my WiFi). I’m so frustrated with this product! I WOULD NOT BUY AGAIN.

This works great with a different brand of Garage Opener.  Door sensor works as well.  My only issue, the App has to be running for Alert to work on iPhone.  If the App is closed, I don't get notification when the Garage door is opened.

It's a good product, does what it's advertised to do. Quick easy installation, clear steps to follow along on the app. It's great really. Main downside is that if you're using Google home as your main hub for controlling it you have to pay a subscription fee. It's small but unless you bought this while it was on sale it adds even more to the price for a function that just about every other smart device does for free.if that doesn't bother you, go for it it really is a great device.

I really love this device. I had a snowblower repair man come to the house yesterday and I was able to let him into the garage from my office several miles away. That is the convenience I was looking for. No more running home at lunch to open up, or giving out the codes to strangers.The only disappointing thing is the added charge for use with voice control on Alexa or Google. Chamberlain should really rethink their stance on this. It is almost 2021. Tech devices are now expected to have voice control included.

I purchased this device about a month ago. I installed it as directed but had an issue with phantom opening of the garage door. I contacted customer service aand nd didn't get much help from them. I finally looked on YouTube and found very good videos on how to set the system up properly. Now that the system has been installed correctly I no longer have phantom openings.
I love that you can share the access without having to give your garage door opener to someone!  I have not done the Alexa integration yet.
I love this.  App has gotten better but sometimes slow to load.  It’s as if you need to log in frequently.  Should just keep you logged in so you don’t need to see log in screen at startup so often.
Nice low key upgrade. No Amazon delivery in my area, but maybe one day. Only con is the door sensor battery died in less than a month.
It sits on a shelf in the box. Have not been able to get it programed. Very disappointed and have not been able to use.  Refund ???

The device doesn't work as you expected. It opens the garage on scheduled TO CLOSE and the app doesn't allow you to close it anymore. The faq claims the issue is the sensor or battery but both have been checked/replaced. No deeper technical orientation provided on the FAQ or phone support. Be aware if someone has stolen your stuff from your garage they don't provide liability insurance.

This installed quickly and the app/alerts are great. It also integrates with our home security system. I love the convenience of not needing to bring a physical house key or rely on the garage keypad for walking the dog or getting dropped off by friends. Great product!
First one that I bought, it synced, but the Garage door will only close.  It won't open.  So I had to return it and get another one.  This time, it worked perfectly.  Good product.

I received this item on Sunday evening and installed it that same day. So far it's garbage. It will ONLY open the door, sometimes, but NEVER close it. The app tells me there's an error and to close it locally. Perhaps others buyers will have better luck with this product. I am going to give it a week. If this garbage does work with in that week, I will be returning it.
Purchased for a neighbor that always forget to close her garage door. I installed in about a half hour. Easy to install, and her door hasn't been left open since.
Worked great on my genie garage door opener. It can open and close my garage door remotely when I'm not home. Awesome product snd super easy to install!
The system was easy to install, no drilling or awkward mounting fixtures needed.I like the idea of being able to monitor the system remotely and open my garage doors remotely.

It works great when it does not report a false status.  MyQ constantly reports my garage door being open when it is already closed.  It then sends a close error which requires me to operate it manually.  Not happy with it.  Hoping it will be fixed through some software upgrade.
Set up was extremely easy, this is probably one of the easiest devices I’ve ever had to set up. Ignor old reviews.
I was so surprised to find it works with my 10 year old garage door opener.  I don't need to check if my door is closed and can use it for Amazon for deliveries.

Very easy to install and setup. Mounted it on the ceiling of the garage,  using the second outlet there for power.I give it a 3 stars because because of the lack of Alexa integration.  I was even asked to rate that feature in this review, where I give it a 1 star because Zero isn’t an option.

One of our garage door openers broke and this was actually cheaper than buying a reputable remote. It was easy to install and works every time. Plus, it's funny my wife still thinks she needs to be pointing her phone at the garage door for it to work (even though I've told her it's not necessary). I would recommend it.

This is a great product  and allows you full control of your garage doors from anywhere.  Installation was very simple and the iPhone app is excellent.  BUT you can only control 2 doors (and that is after $30 for the 2nd sensor).  Technically this does not make sense.  The app looks like it can easily accommodate multiple sensors.  I suspect this is just a way for Chamberlain to sell more hubs.  Disappointing.
This is a great product, compatible with many garage door openers. Installation is a breeze. Highly recommend. It qorks with AMAZON Key if you want to use that feature.

We love this product. It wasn't as easy to install but with the help from customer service I was up & running in a few minutes. The app was very easy to install and its very easy to use. I love knowing what's the status of my garage door since its detached from my home.

I like the concept and that you can schedule to have the doors close at a specific time. Was also fairly easy to setup.What I do not like is that it says compatible with Google Home. But you have to pay a subscription fee to have it enabled.  I don't need to talk to a device that much where I have to pay monthly or yearly fees.

This took about 20 minutes total time to install; very easy.  It works as advertised, I have 2 garage doors; so I bought an extra sensor.  Basically bought it to know if I left the garage open (which I do after driving away) and then to be able to close remotely.
Easy to install and use. I can open and close my garage doors from anywhere and I can tell when my kids take the car and come back home.
Super easy to install, was done in less than 30 minutes. Makes me way more comfortable being away from home now that I can remotely track garage door status.

I rarely review a product but this one deserves some praise. Wanted to be able to open and close my garage door remotely and stumbled on to his product.Literally 15 minute install or less. Works perfectly. Best new product I've bought in years and I wish I'd thought of it.
This is such a wonderful product can control with phone and never need opener. A must have for anyone with garage doors
I can never remember whether I closed my garage door or not.  This tells me If I left it open and I can close it without having to drive back home......
With the use of this item, opening and closing our garage door anytime and anywhere we want are possible. It also notify us the exact time it opens and closes.Highly recommended.

So far it does what i wanted it to do: open the garage door using my phone. Beyond this i heard that it may require a subscription to have it work with your smart home devices.I'd say the only downside is on the mobile app - sometimes it takes a while to open the application (just a few extra seconds)

It was incredibly easy to install! I even used the app “shortcuts” to allow Siri to open and close with voice commands. My favorite feature is customizable alerts. If my garage door stays open 30 mins, I get alerted to it!
This is way more simple to setup than Nexgarage. No magnetic sensor to fiddle with or wires to string over to the garage door.  Setup was pretty easy and it seems to be working fine.
Not that great, sometimes the garage door is closed & it shows open or it’s open & it shows closed.We can go & push the button to open or close & it resets.

It goes offline ( stops working) and the instructions could be more through, especially  with the sequence of programming remotes after the keypads and vehicles. Watch the YouTube videos first. I recommend waiting for the next generation.

This product so far has exceeded expectations. Instructions were easy. Peace in the valley ! My grown up boys (and maybe me) would leave the door open at times. My wife can now check it from work as can I. Great product
Doesn't work with Google Home. Google Assistant will open the app. That's not at all "integrated" and I'm mad at myself for buying this terribly misleading product without reading more about it.

It was easy to install and excellent customer service. I did not had the hand held remote and YouTube only showed how to configure with that, so I called the customer support, support tech walked me through. Within 5 min, I had it working. Very happy saved me tons of money as I was planning to buy a new garage opener..

Bought my first unit, installed it with easy set up. Connected to WiFi for about 6 hours then went offline never to reconnect. Returned to Amazon and replaced. Installed the replacement. Connected to WiFi for 2 days then, POOF! No more connection. Sent back to Amazon with confirmation on April 8th. So far, no replacement and no refund.Yeah, I'm just a bit disappointed.

I absolutely love this device. We are able to provide family members and guests access to the garage and home even when we’re not home. It was easy to install and works well. We are very pleased with this purchase.
I have a detached garage, the WiFi range did not work in my situation. I ended up returning the product.  I wish I had known about the WiFi reach being a requirement when I bought it!
Works great for remotely monitoring the status of your garage door! It’s also nice to have amazon packages delivered into your garage to deter porch pirates! Eff porch pirates....

My Chamberlain keypad stopped working - thought I'd try this as a better solution - not so!  I continually get messages on my phone that the garage door has remained open for several hours only to find out it's in fact closed - Also it errors out if using the hard wired button inside the garage - when this happens you will not be able to open the garage door - either fix the darn thing or stop selling the product! - It's terrible...
It reset once on install day, since has been very reliable and easy to use. Really cool product and I feel more secure knowing door status anywhere.
Great item. Works like a charm. For some reason, it take longer for it to close the door than to open it, but it's not enough to be an issue. Very easy to set up.

I got this smart garage door opener set today, and so excited, could not wait to try it. It just wasted my hours in the garage, trying again and again, following the instructions carefully, the instructions indicated that might take multiple tries, I was so patient. Still, it didn't work for my garage. The idea was cool, so I should give at least one star.
Went in quick, and easy.  App took longer to set up than actual hardware.  I really like that I can see if my garage door doesn't fully close after I leave.

So far, so good. I've got a Liftmaster opener with a MyQ logo on the side (came with the house) so I figured it had the MyQ stuff built in. Apparently not, but this was a cheap way ($20 on Black Friday weekend) to get it. Installed very easily - probably less than 10 minutes, to be honest. Will update if anything changes.

Easy to install, well worth the money. We just bought our house. The old owner gave us two remote and one passcode to the garage that do not work.... but this made it so easy! Now I can just open the garage door with my phone, when and wherever.

I like that it was easy to setup and install. Even works with my Apple Watch series 4! which allows me to check the status of the door (open/close) and open or close the door from my watch along with notifications. Make sure you get the new MyQ app from the app store (it has blue background).
Very easy to install and setup.I can't figure out how to integrate it with Alexa. I have tried several things. The root app doesn't integrate for sure.

I love everything about this!! My kids have left the garage door open ALL NIGHT! I have left foot eighth abs left the door open.  It's so scary! No kotter of that!  The peace of mind alone is priceless
It worked for a couple weeks, now it will not open or close the door.  It will tell me that the door is open or closed, but that’s not the main function.
The product installation and set up is easy. The real problem began when the garage door was didn't close on command from app/remote; error msg displayed - safety sensor, checked: working
This was super simple to setup and works fine.  Even allows Amazon to deliver packages in the garage now.  Make your old dumb garage door smart by adding this product.

A liitle difficult to install but great customer service and tech support. Make sure you have time for tech support and install. I had a 10' tall door so a little climbing up and down made things more difficult
I installed and synced in less that 30 minutes. It walked me through step by step.  It works great on my chamberlain whisper 1999 model.

MyQ is a great product! It was easy to install and I now have remote access to control my garage door opener from my iphone.  I was able to install MyQ for control of my 15 year old garage door opener.  I can look at the app and it clearly indicates whether the garage door is open or closed. And if I forget to close my door, MyQ has alerts so I will be alerted and then can close the door without having to drive back to the house.  I highly recommend this product if you want to be able to open/close your garage door remotely.
The install was pretty straightforward. Instructions are clear. No issues with connectivity in the garage.  Been eyeing this for a while and was glad to catch this at such a low price.

Besides being a great product, the step by step instructions on my iPhone were the best ever. They were simple to follow, and very complete. Every step was included in easy to understand descriptions and pictures...couldn’t have been easier. We are enjoying the ease of use, and the peace of mind knowing the status of our 2 garage doors on our iPhones and Apple Watches.
I picked this up on Amazon during Prime days for under thirty dollars. It is a great product. The extra sensor costs more than what I paid for the whole system but still it's worth it.

This Product is fairly easy to install, I will give it that and easy to use.  The main issue I had was I was looking to intergrade it with Alexa so we can use it.  That is not the case.  The description is misleading in that aspect. I was very disappointed with this.
Straight forward installation, they take the customer by hand through the installation process.It works as it should be, I'm so glad with the end result.

My wife would often wonder if she put the door down.  I bought this to alleviate her concerns.  Super easy to install.  I installed it whenbshe was 300 miles away.  She downloaded the app and was able to view the door status, as well as, raise and lower the door.  Showed my neighbor, he ordered one.  Told a friend, he ordered one.  Make sure you have good wifi! (I do)
This is definitely one of our favorite purchases. It’s easy to install, use and setup alerts and schedules. Highly recommend.
Pretty terrible home automation tech. A. You need to buy a subscription. B. It only works with a limited number of manufacturers. Guardian is not supported.
Product works but I keep an getting error message stating issue with main unit and I could get a replacement. But the link that is attached is not working. Unfortunately I can't submit the claim.
Easy to set up! Makes it easy for us to have someone come and take care of our cats and then we can monitor when they come and go. Love it!
Very easy to install. Love that I can set parameters to which i get notifications. Having the piece of mind of being able to see if the garage is shut or not is very nice.

Works excellent, installation of the product was not hard, connecting the app to the product is not easy and had to call tech support to figure it out. Tech representative was excellent and everything works excellent.

Horrible consistency.  I would say it works as intended about 50% of the time. I'm constantly getting door remained open notifications even though the door closed, tried reset and reinstall be batteries. But still, not reliable enough for me to recommend purchasing.

Easy to install and set up. Complete in less than 20 minutes. No directions in the box with the item but the app walks you through it step by step.  By far the best garage door opener I have installed. App is very user friendly.

Excellent additional control for your garage door. Link it with your phone to remotely close it or open it. Also tracks history. Easy way to check if the garage door is closed when you are away. Can link it with IFTT or Google assistant to close it automatically when you leave the house.

I purchased this 3weeks ago and it hasn’t worked consistently. Poor connectivity, sporadic operation and poor customer service. I feel that I have thrown my money out the window. I would look for another WiFi garage door monitor,  besides Chamberlain.
I purchased this unit to add my other garage door to my hub. I had to run the setup for a second opener a couple times but now that it is set up it works as expected.

I was looking for a product that would let me know if i put the garage door down after leaving.  The app shows the position of the door and will also alert you if you want when the door goes up or down.  Very easy to install and has very good instructions through the app.
This product is pure trash.  There are many third-part alternatives, save yourself pain and get one of the alternatives.  This farce doesn't even have an Alexa skill.  Junk.

Had issues with the setup, but excellent support walked me through everything and then helped connect my old system on another door to my new phone. After setup, nothing more to do...ever! (Note: with the door opener I had, I didn't need to stick the sensor to the door. Only found that out when I talked to customer support.)

About half of the time I try to open the garage remotely, it does not work. I am going to replace it with something that will hopefully work all of the time. I also want to get one that will work with Alexa since this one does not.

Very good system at a very reasonable price.  Instructions are fairly good, but needs to have more description as to what color your "Smart" button is on your opener.  Mine was considered purple, but it looked more like red, pink or anything but purple, so I struggled until I called support and they squared me away!
It is wonderful for me! My husband has a habit of leaving the garage door open and now I can remotely check and close it . Very convenient for me!
I love that i can now close or open my garage from anywhere. It even lets you know how long your garage has been open. Easy install.
can open spontaneously. other people reported this problem. please disable when not at home or buy cheaper remote garage opener.
Super addition to my garages.  Easy to set up.  Even easier to use.  Only downside was I immediately needed a CR2450 battery but was notified via email it was necessary.
Very easy to install even with my older model of opener. The app is well designed. I have had packages delivered by amazon via the door and it lets you know.
Device is great to ensure you have closed your garage door when you are away and it indicates how long it has been open or closed.  Straightforward to install.

Super easy to install.  Works great.  So nice knowing I didnt forget to close the garage door.  Ever wondered if you remembered to close the garage door?  Now not only can you check on your cell phone but you can close it or open it from anywhere.
It is nearly perfect, except for a couple of times we had trouble with the app. on our phone doing what we wanted.
Easy to install took 20 minutes to have it up and running 5 stars all the way. There is no app charge as some others were saying.
Works very well.I don't worry about my garage being left open anymore.  Also,  I can let guess in from across the country.

Ridiculously easy to install. Only wish this came with the home hub, too. Otherwise, there is no Siri integration. You need additional hardware for that. That said, it will work with Wink and other 3rd party apps.
did not work for me and I returned itset up is convoluted and instructions are not detailed enough

Set up was very easy!  I don't know what the negative reviews are for.  Maybe defective or they didn't follow instructions.  Even adding guests is easy.  I added my brother and sister and it was a breeze.  I had them try it from their house and it worked perfectly.  If you want to monitor your garage door this is perfect.  I got it on Prime Day so I got it cheaper than the regular price.

Yeah took me about 15 min to get the one I got for Xmas and then I had to buy for my second door, which took me about 5 min to install. Go to work with peace of mind now knowing that I know if the door is closed or not and with a simple click I can close the doors if I forgot. Brilliant, didn't have to spend 700$ a door to replace the whole mechanism as some door professional told me that was the only way!

This product works BUT only within the Chamberlain App. DOES NOT integrate with Wink as advertised. Chamberlain has been contacted & their response has been abysmal. Continue to state it’s important to them and they will notify when they have a solution. REPEAT, IF YOU WANT TO INTEGRATE THIS WITH WINK YOU WILL BE DISAPPOINTED. DO NOT PURCHASE.
Was very easy to install. Notifies when door is open or closed. Great Item and fair price.
The product is good, very easy to install. 3 starts only because of the subscription fee for IFTTT, so I can't connect to Google home. Also, there is a delay receiving notifications.
It works great and since I have a detached garage and can't see door from house it's wonderful... For the price and function I'm delighted..

Satisfied with this except the price had an additional 30% discount after my purchasing. BTW, their customer service is professional and helpful for the installation. Now I can monitor my garage with this and a wyze cam - total cost is $50.
Works fine. haven’t test The most important aspect of the garage door will alert me or automatically close if I forgotten to leave the door open
I wanted an opener that I could control from my phone in order to make sure the kids put the door down when they leave.  It works very easily, and set up was a breeze.  Not too expensive either.

We did the installation that at one time which in our opinion would have been easier.  Also, we did print out the information from the website which solved our issue we had at the time.  We have a habit of not making sure our garage is closed so we travel back to verify if we did or not.  I learned about the item from one of our friends and he loved it.  Two people are now interested in installing in their garage and we can help them with installation.

Installation easy to follow but pairing with a Chamberlin myQ labelled  motor did not work. Number of attempts were completed with instructions to contact product support. Product support was not helpful as suggestions were not correct as the online installation would not let part of the installation process that support indicated would correct the issue was not possible to bypass. Product will not pair with a Chamberlin myQ labelled motor.
Works great with my Linear garage door unit. Installation was fast and easy. I ran into absolutely no issues with set up and pairing.

Once I figured everything out for my garage door it was very easy to install and use the app. I love it so far.  If you follow the instructions, which I didn't at first, it is really easy to install. Tip. Install the sensor to the right not in the center of the garage door. Which the instructions clearly state.

This was recommended to us by a few people and we were very excited about it. However, it stopped working the second day we had it. We got it to work and now just a few months later it won't work at all.

I wanted something to allow for more convenient control over my garage door in case my remote was not handy. I bike to the gym and want to take as few things with me as possible. Plus, I never have to wonder if I closed the garage door.
Compare to 2 or 3 pcs remote controller for a family, this product is much better and also cheaper solution. I am very happy to find it out and use it for my new house.
We did run into some issues installing but once it was set up, we haven't had any issues. Took some time to get it connected but it never fails now.
Very good product but 1 item i purchased is showing low battery even it has a new one. Still functioning as usual but really annoying.
This was a second sensor so I'd already gone through the pain of setting up the first one, including the hub.  Adding this unit was a breeze, now both door work remotely.
From the picture on amazon I thought it was the size of a dinner plate! It's only about 5 inches across.

Great value, works as expected and easy to install. There is a loud ringing from the WiFi controller when the app is used to close the door, although it is a safety feature, it is loud and annoying - however it will only ring if closed by the app, otherwise it operates normally. No problems after one week of it installed.. so far I like it a lot

After spending 20 minutes reading and installing.  System works about 50% of the time. It means half of the time, it shows accurate status of the garage (open/close).  Can't believe they cannot make this simple task to work properly

Excellent product... easy to install, the Chamberlain app recognized it very quickly. Took a little time to get it to connect to wifi. You can raise or lower the door from anywhere, or check on its status.

Very easy to install. Also set up was easy. Works great. Just wish there was Alexa compatibility. Why can I use it as a key for Amazon deliveries but Alexa can't tell me if the door is open or closed?

This was a great choice. I was tired of having to return home to see if I remembered to close my door or having a neighbor check for me. I love that I can control the door from my phone. Always have a garage door opener with me.Was a but tricky to sync but got it going after a number of attempts.

I was very excited when I installed it . It works ok at times but the respond time of the app is really slow . It errors out very easily .Couple of times we have to drive back to check whether garage is opened or closed. If the request is not complete and leave the pla e it reopens the garage . So please be careful and we cannot solely depend on this app.

Good installation instructions, complete and easy to follow. Got it working without any problems, system worked just as the instructions said it would. I have a unconnected garage one stairway away. This really solved all my problems.
Wish I hadn’t purchased this product or let the return period pass. It doesn’t open or close like promised. I paid to have it installed and it is the worst product that I have purchased from Amazon.
This is awesome!  I simply downloaded the app and registered an account.  Step by step  instructions followed on my cell phone screen.  Took less than 30 minutes to install.
Very easy to install and use. I am 450 miles away and can check my door status, open it,shut it and it let's me know if it has been opened.

Easy install and very convenient. Only con is that the main user only is sent alerts that the door is open. I worked around this by changing the email address after installation. So the main user gets the push notifications and another user gets email notifications.

Setup and install was very easy.  App works great!  I bought a second sensor so my hub could control either garage door.  Only issue was having a LED light bulb in my opener unit.  The app seemed to only work once in a while, and would not report the open/close status correctly.  Turns out interference from the LED light was messing up the WIFI communications. Once I replaced the bulb with an incandescent, or CFL, it worked perfectly.
Buy it, the set up was easy and it’s so nice to be able to control your garage door from your phone

Installed 4 or 5t times from the beginning. The device can’t tell what position the door is in. Sends an error that wont clear. Just a mess. Not worth the aggravation. If you have a physical disability or for some reason REALLY NEED this, it might be worth the hassle.

Outstanding product. Easy 5 minute install with excellent instructions. If you can turn a screwdriver and have a step stool you can successfully install this product without issue. Setting up the WiFi was simple.
Apparently after 4 days of trails and error and hours with tech support this unit will not work with a newer Genie garage door opener .. very frustrating
Great accessory for my garage.  Actually came in handy when my garage opener battery died. No problem, used the app to open it.
Alexa integration is only temporary as they will attempt to charge for access to cloud services. And the batteries only lasted 5 months before requiring replacement
took for ever to set it up.have some connections issues

Product Installed correctly after  removing device from the app, then reinstall it. Tested repeatedly successfully.  After two weeks of non-use, found the door and app out of sync. Spent an hour over the phone with tech support.  Issue unresolved. Sent detailed description of continued failures. Tech support acknowledged email but did not reply. System gets out of sync with app and will not shut door requiring physical presence to correct error.

Works as advertised! I bought this without reviewing the list of compatible garage door openers. Turns out Marantec 7500q is not one of them but after reading about the linear megacode receiver, I was able to make it work. Now I can open and close remotely and I am adding the home bridge for Homekit compatibility. Very pleased.
Took 4 tries to connect to internet. Next day it lost connection. Again took a few tries to connect. Has been working well since. Bought for Amazon garage delivery but they still leave at front door.

"Universal compatibility" in the description is misleading.  It wasn't compatible with my post 1993 opener (Zap 800) , nor is it even compatible with a Chamberlain external receiver.  Befor you buy, go to their website and confirm compatibility and save yourself some frustration.
Stopped working after 2 months.  No longer pairs with my Geni 2028 garage door motor.

It was easy to install and seems to operate as advertised. The only thing I'd like to see is a timer that would automatically alert me or close the door if it's open more than x minutes. I can schedule it to close at a specific time, but not to close in a certain interval after it's been opened. Seems like an easy add... Thanks!
Very happy about this purchase.  Initially used as a backup/security feature, but now it is all we use to open/close garage doors.

I always get a garage closed notifications, but I don't seem to get garage door open notifications. I do have the setting turned on. Installation was incredibly easy! The remote features work great, no issues other than the notifications. The history log does have the right entries though.

Works as promised. Can’t ask for much more in a product.  Given that it involves an app and internet I was expecting the worst.  You do need a reasonable WiFi connection. It’s nice to be notified when my grandchildren have forgotten to close the door!!!
Easy to install as long as you read and follow the instructions. Let's me know if the garage door is open or closed. No more "did I close the garage door? Just open the app and see.

Well designed and documented product.  App install instructions were well illustrated and straightforward.  Initially had trouble connecting 2 sensors for both of my garage doors. Then I sought & received immediate support from Chamberlain techs. Readily got everything up & running at that point. While still not thrilled that product does not seamlessly work w Alexa, after researching online, was able to connect using 3rd party app w Alexa's skill tools.
When it’s not going offline, it’s perfect. There is strong WiFi signal in my garage, but the darn thing goes offline so no understandable reason. Comes back online a few minutes later.

I have two of these hubs.  They have been a lifesaver. It has been wonderful to open the garage for a friend, make sure we got the door shut when we left, watch the kids come home from school through the garage door access.It is a real nice addition.
I like a lot is use for delivery because sometimes rain or I’m not at home and is very easy  use in the app notifications!
Had it set up and functioning in 30 minutes.Love the auto close feature on a set schedule.

Wasted more than an hour trying to set this up.  I finally completed the install, but it simply doesn't work as a garage door opener. It does work as a garage door monitor (but I already have security cameras for that).Chamberlain (the manufacturer) technical support is virtually nonexistent. (Take the money and run mindset.)

This product was a waste of my money and time. It did not work - After calling the company for assistance, I was told ( AFTER PURCHASE ) it was not compatible with my garage door opener. They should provide a list of non compliant operners allowing the consumer to determine its compatibility before the purchase.
This product is wonderful for the parents and kids. App is easy to download and work. Great product and worth the every penny.
Very awesome product and was a breeze to install. Took me 15mins to install and no longer have to worry about having to have the garage door remote with me at all times.
Worked well. It's really easy to set up. Mounting on the roof is optional, I just placed it at the front of the garage facing the garage door.

Easy to install and works well, but the Nest integration that they speak of enables you to see your other Nest devices from the Chamberlain app, not the other way around.  So, in order to control your garage door you need to use their app, not Nest or Google Assistant.  You can BUY Google Assistant integration for $10 a year, but it should come included.  Still, it does a good job, I just wish they'd include true Nest integration.
Haven't integrated it with Alexa yet. We would expect that to work well. It was easy to install and the remote control function works well via the app on an android phone.
I bought this thinking it was going to work with Alexa but it doesn’t .. anyway still can open my old garage opener via WiFi .1 star until it get Alexa .
This is amazing, I regret not integrating this earlier. It was a breeze to install and connect. I recommend this to anyone and everyone.
It works problem is customer service said it would shut by itself if I program it. But that is not true you have to program it for one day what time. Also next day was $20 cheaper!
Like the conscience.

Have a chamberlain 1/2 hp garahe opener. Have the orange button. Followed directions. It REALLLY took me 10 minutes. Super easy cant be more happy. I have smart things but i dont need to integrate because i have a backup open close sensor.

My Q garage opener was an easy install even for the average joe. From start to finish, the install took about 20min. Most of that time was spent finding the right location to install the Bluetooth sensor. The hub itself is recommended to be installed on top of the ceiling next the the garage motor. However I found it far more convenient to place the hub on one of my shelves. In all, the My Q remote functions as described and provides accurate notifications if garage  door is open or closed.

Great overall, but not perfect. App has delays and can get stuck if push close more than once. Can only be reset at home. Support is not very helpful. Biggest con and reason for 3 stars is no Alexa voice support!
Super easy to install.  Easily connected to Wifi. Easy to use.  I would recommend it to everyone.
Got this on a really good sale. Never paired. Just didn't work even though it is compatible with my garage opener. Had to return.
Easy to install and you can however allow a stranger to deliver a package and open your garage and allow access to your house.. No thanks.

Great product! Works as described.  By reviews I had read I was planning on paying a monthly fee.  But, by surprise there's not a required monthly service.  Simply install the app on your phone and it opens and closes my garage as expected. Very simple, works great.

It was great until it wasn't.  After replacing the battery on the door sensor, it started to error from time to time.  Sometimes the door was closed but the app said it was open.  The scheduled close at night started to open the garage door instead of closing it.  Checked the battery by the recommendation, and the battery was fine.  This is supposed to save time and provide better control, but it is costing me time and insecurity.
With kids in the house we never knew if garage was left opened or not. This product took care of our problem.
Although a great price offer by Amazon. The MyQ app By Chamberlain works fine. So disappointed that it is not compatible with Amazon Alexa.

Install was easy but I have  to continually delete and reload app. The system crashes a lot and shows a closing error when there is none and then the error message will not reset with uninstalling and reinstalling program. Nice idea but software is buggy.
It is as described. Works well and so far no problem from what I've heard from my friend who I have given this as a gift.
I have experienced where the door status is out of sync with the myQ app on the iPhone.  This happens frequently; sit makes this product unreliable.  Any idea how to fix this?

Super easy to install, took 5 minutes. I wish there was an option to order several door sensors. It was less expensive to buy a whole second system than it was for a door sensor. App is easy to use and allows for scheduling the doors to go down, no more leaving the garage open all night!
no need to purchase a more expensive garage door opener. you can turn your automatic garage door opener into a remote garage door as long as you have wifi.
It was easy to install, but we cannot get it to link up to our phones.  This is for a vacation home, so we aren't there all the time to work thru the bugs.
I loved the step by step instructions and videos.  Works great and gives me peace of mind when I leave home and can’t remember if I shut the garage door!
Love this and would give five stars except for the fact that my garage door opener is only capable of showing status and not opening or closing remotely. Otherwise is a great product.

Super easy to install. Wish it could be integrated with google home app, read that it works with google assistant so I assumed it worked with google home app. No biggie just hate having to use extra apps
This item is the best ever to control your garage door. I can open or close from anywhere. It was easy to install. I highly recommend this item to anyone who has an auto Garage door.

This item is absolutely great! I didn't know what to expect because I am not tech savvy so I paid for a professional installation BUT Amazon could not find anyone in my area so they refunded my money for the installation. My son installed it in 10 minutes and I love it.
Product needs work. Disappointed because I really needed it because I forget to close garage. Both the app and product is defective. Wouldn’t recommend to anyone!
Had several sync issues and conflicted with Tesla garage opener. I have to disconnect it to make tesla opener to function.
Not Alexa compatible -  no skill available to resolve this issue thus far.Besides that this a thing works perfectly, just needs it own app

It was very easy to install, configure, and use. Integrated into our opener that is about 8 years old without issue.My only real issue is the price of a second door sensor is nearly the same as this kit. But it is what it is and does what I wanted it to do without any issues.
DangerousOpens garage door by itself in the middle of the night
Works as advertised.  Easy to set up and control.  However, beware that this hub can control only 2 garage doors.  If you want to control a 3rd door you need to buy a second hub.

Easy to install.....app is easy to use.  Don't know how many times I have left house and can't remember if I closed the garage door!  Now the app tells me door status.  No more trying to remember....Well worth the price!
The app has detailed installation instructions, including videos.  Easy installation - worked the first time.  It already has saved me from going back home to make sure I closed the garage door.
Love being able to check my garage door and open/close from anywhere. No more worrying or wondering if I forgot to close my garage.

This product was so simply to install after plugging it in the longest part was signing up for the app it took all of 4 mins from start to finish now I don’t have to come back home just to see if the garage door is closed it notify’s if the garage is open longer the five mins my preferenceBy far the best product out there
easy to install. Great to check your garage. easy to connect to internet. Great product for me
Easy to install and very helpful to monitor if your garage is open or close. You can also customize to to send you an alert of garage door is open for a long time.
As of January 2019, this does not connect to Alexa. This was the entire reason we purchased it. Otherwise or does work through their app.
This was a lot easier to install than I thought. You have to follow the instructions and watch the videos. It’s now working really well for me.

Tech support is very helpful, but with a simple warning in the manual I wouldn't have needed to spend an hour on the phone with them...Installation and setup is straight forward as long as you have newer rolling code remotes. My Craftsman orange button opener has older remotes that use a different frequency and codes; I could only have the hub or remotes paired at a time. Wound up having to buy a new clicker and reprogram my car. Couldn't find that info searching the internet so hoping this might pop up if someone else runs in to this.
Finally don't need to worry if the garage door is closed or not. Installation is also easy, it only took me about 10-20 minutes to have it set up.
Super easy to install and works well with my Google home assistant.  Get now while subscription is free
Great price.  Easy setup. Perfect integration with Alexa. Love that Amazon delivers packages right inside my garage.  Hard to believe the low price.

I have to take care of that now.Regardless, working perfect after installing the wifi extender.

This seemed like an easy fix, however every single time I've tried to close it remotely away from home it hasn't worked. I have had to either drive back home from work or have a neighbor check on it for me. Would not recommend

Worked fine first 3 months, but last three months have been plagued with continued issues of either false alarms about door being up when it isn’t, or the sensor just stops working and needs to be reset...  It’s being a twice weekly problem of doing a pairing between units to make it work...  Will probably be replacing it soon

I purchased two hubs, one for my shop and one for my garage. The first install took me about 1/2 hour from out of the box to fully installed. My second instal took about 15 minutes. It's easy, and the in ap instructions are great. My only complaint is that as of now it's not integratable with the Amazon Echo. Once that happens it will be perfect for my household.
Great product. Well worth getting. We like it so much besides having one, we bought one for our daughter and one to give for a school auction.

Amazon should stop selling the open box version of the MyQ hub. It will not work once associated with another account. It was also missing the garage door sensor.

...because they removed the Alexa skill for this! Also, it did not come with instructions for programming with my garage opener (Liftmaster 3800, owned by Chamberlin). Had to use trial and error to get it to sync with the opener.

Works like a charm. Got set up in 15 minutes, and haven't had an issue since. Gives me remote access to open and close my garage, and it provides an activity history.In my mind, it's a 5-star product, but if i could change 2 things, it'd be this:

Installation was very easy. The App is so well designed to make the installation a snap. Works with our Wayne Dalton garage opener.

Zero stars if possible. Absolute junk. Hub never finds the sensor. Can’t get past that and no trouble shooting options. Extra piss that now they have my email and WiFi password and I can’t wipe it. Garbage. Do not buy.

Minimal packaging, directions very easy to follow in the MyQ app, which were complete with videos. It took less than 30 minutes to install. Works as designed and the alarm beeps for a bit to let you know the door is about to go down.

Physical installation was simple and straight forward.  Setting up the android app was unintuitive, difficult and time consuming.  You must have a very strong Wi-Fi signal in the installation area.  The results were worth the effort!
This is turned out to be garbage. I can’t get I. My garage half the time. Sensor error. It isn’t supported by Alexa so she can’t tell you if doot is open or closed. Which is partly why I bought it.
Six months later still can’t get this to work and I’m tired of calling Chamberlain to make it work

I'm an iOS/iPhone user and am an experienced tech hobbiest with a home outfitted with "smart home" products from Rachio, eero, ecobee,  Lutron, Ring, Amazon, Apple, Logitech and more. The setup of this product is needlessly complex and difficult and downright doesn't work properly when integrated (and so silly to have a separate box) with another of their products the "Home Bridge" to use Apple HomeKit and Siri. Let me explain...1. To install JUST this product you must have a 2.4 ghz Wifi signal in your home, this device will not work on the 5.0 ghz band. While unusual in 2018 that's not a deal breaker. What is a terrible pain is you must ensure your smartphone, used to setup this device, is also logged into the 2.4 ghz band. This can be tricky because many modern routers blend the bands (both 2.4 & 5.0) and every wi-fi device in your home chooses the best for that device. Of course the MyQ Smart Garage chooses the 2.4 ghz band but nearly all modern smartphones choose the 5.0 ghz (because it allows faster speeds in general) at which time you can not setup the MyQ Smart Hub. The Chamberlain app doesn't even warn you of this but rather fails or hangs with no explanation if your phone is on 5.0 ghz. Other products from other companies in the smartphone space somehow have developed a way to properly setup their devices even if on separate bands but not Chamberlain. This led to me having to setup this device in places in the house where the 5.0 ghz signal was weak so that my phone would join 2.4 ghz. Crazy! The process to setup this device while not "hard" is needlessly complex and takes many steps from joining an adhoc temporary wifi network setup by the Smart Hub, to launching a local webpage created by the Smart Hub, interpreting a series of flashing and steady lights on the device itself, to switching back to regular (2.4!) home wifi, switching to "complete" the install in the smartphone app etc. It's just a pain. That said it does work in the end and once setup the app itself, while not pretty and modern looking does work and opens and closes the door reliably and will send you customizable alerts if the door is open too long etc.

I can’t tell how much impressed I am with this product. Made my life easy on Garage door management. I was always worried if the garage door is closed or not when I go out, but with this simple tool, boom all my tensions are gone. I strongly redolent this product for your security specially if you have kids and you travel. Love this.

Native app works well most of the time, but was hoping it was integrated with Google Home, not just Google Assistant. Which is actually different. I was hoping my Google home display would allow for easy touch screen control in addtion to voice. Noting; the voice functionality is crap too for opening the door, and can't get it to work. Only will close. Or vise versa can't recall.
Tech support was nice and helpful but it would not pair with my motor.  They said I could have a bad memory board.  I returned and will get a new motor one day with Wifi built in.
I really love this thing. Installed it on 2 garage doors and installed app on my iPhone and then realized it works on my Apple Watch too. So convenient.

Great product, works like it should, had left my garage open by mistake before I bought it , now I got the app on my phone and I can check my garage door status from anywhere and close it or open it from anywhere.

Looking forward to using the integration with Amazon Key for deliveries in garage once Amazon enables this again. Very satisfied and would highly recommend.

Best purchase that I’ve made in a while, however I really wanted Alexa to work with it (as advertised).  Even then...this is STILL a 5 star product

Installation is EZ. Watch the video then follow the instructions.One thing I did was mount the hub with 3M HD Velcro Command strips rather than the bracket. I will have to temporarily take it down soon in order to paint the garage.
Great product for the price. With a little configuring I now have my garage door opening when I get close to home and closing when I leave!

For some reason Chamberlain removed compatibility with IFTTT.  Also I had to install the hub far away from the door opener.  For some reason, it does not work when within 6ft of the opener.  Their website does list in small print,"Linking MyQ to IFTTT requires subscription fee."  In looking at the MyQ support forum, people that have signed up still cannot close the door due to liability issues with closing the door remotely via an automated function.  They want you to be liable for the door closing on someone and not an automation.

The jury is still out on this.  I'm glad I bought it at the discounted price. Seems like the garage door must be open for at least one minute before it can be cycled in the opposite direction. Would be nice if Chamberlain would tell you it has a specific cycle time.  Serves my purposes just fine so far.
I like how this unit is almost universal and how easy it was to install. I'd say it was about 8 mins from unboxing to using.

My wife and I are always going back to check and see if we closed the garage door!  It’s embarrassing, as the neighbors have to wonder why we ride back past our home, after having just left.  No longer.  With the MyQ smart garage hub, I just check my phone.  If open, I can close from my smart phone.  If closed, we just keep rolling down the road.  Easy to install and use.

This gets my award for worst tech purchase of the decade, beating out the DOA bluetooth speaker dock. The reason is the shrill beeping while closing the door. It's loud like a smoke alarm, and there's no way to disable it. It's extra awesome when the myQ fails to close the door and won't stop beeping. I'm very patient with technology, and this is the first device I ever threw in the trash, brand new.
Super easy install.  I’ve already used it to let a repair person in.  It does NOT work with Nest.  It would be a huge improvement if it worked with Apple CarPlay.
Took 20 minutes to set up and connect. Great step by step video on the app. Much EASIER than programming a garage door opener on a new car!
20% of the time it says the garage is open but it's closed... And to get it reset is frustrating and confusing.

The initial setup was amazing, but changing the mount caused it to disconnect and reconnecting was a nightmare. Had to factory reset several times  to recognize the door sensor. Now that it’s finally working, I love it.
These things are great, being able to know if your garage door is open when you're away and or open and close it for someone.
Chamberlain is blocking users with wink hubs from using MYQ.Do not buy this product

This product is easy to install,  doesn't require extensive wiring of sensors and doesn't require you to stand on a ladder attaching wires to main unit. I can't believe someone wrote a bad review on this product.  The sensor is truly wireless and there is no wiring to main unit required. I wish I disregarded bad review and bought this unit first.
It doesn't work with Alexa, though there is a guy on youtube with a work around for that

This makes a garage door opener smart. Convenience and peace of mind at its best! Follow the instructions and app will walk you through the steps. Simple, easy and crisp instructions. Value for money..

I love this so much. It seems like we are always short one remote and this way I always have one available!! I love the fact that I can let my parents and friends add on for when they come and we’re not home. I wish there was a way to only give them access at specific times or for a number of days at a time though. I don’t want to have to keep adding  them if the need it again.
Super easy to install. Has helped out on many occasions when I haven’t been home and needed to let someone in to the garage.
Does not work with Amazon or google smart home devices, really disappointing
Works fantastic installed easy with my d door opener and Droid phone now thinking about using in conjunction with ring to allow me to open garage door for delivery drivers.
No issues, works as described for me. Signal strength seems fine, sensor works as expected, open/close, notifications work, etc.

I don't write many reviews but I had to in this case to shout out the awesome support team @ chaimberlain. Setup 1st time was easy but then stopped working when I installed on ceiling. Did a hard reset and could never get it to pair again. Called support and spoke to a rep who walked me through an easy to follow alternate setup method. Problem solved.
Loving it so far. Only thing is that it seems the alerts sometimes don't come in for an hour or so, and someties they come through immediately.

This was VERY easy to install. App is super intuitive. I'm bummed that linking to Google Home didn't work and seems very difficult but otherwise I'm very, very happy with this purchase. $40ish to open my garage from my phone. Happy days.
Great product that works flawlessly and very easy to install...I like that I no longer have to go back to see if I closed garage door
Easy to install and pair with the host unit. Just the whole thing is pricy for what it does. Sometimes the unit will give a false positive but for the most part works well.

Installation literally only takes 10 minutes; after you read the instructions or watch the video. I have not had any problems with the system. Works as advertised. Wish it had an integrated camera though. Hence the 4-star rating.
Great deal at $20. Easy install. I like the notifications I get when doors are opened and closed. Also like the remote capabilities.
Well worth it! To access your garage anywhere on your phone well worth it! Only thing is if you lose internet at your house for any reason. GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE!
Excellent, I’m always forgetting to close my I enjoy the convenience of just going to app and checking my status.
I only spend 10 mins to set up, It is easy for me to use it. all of my family can use it. only one things need to do is download the app that is! I like it !

Love this product. Quick and seamless install even with what seems like an ancient lift master opener. Took advantage of the free Google Home integration and was able to set up a custom command to simplify things even more. I wanted this product not only for the smart feature but with it on sale it was cheaper than buying more remote openers. Have not had any issues at all, highly recommend!
I am very impressed with this product . It was so easy to install and set up. It works flawlessly  and I'm so happy I can still use my existing remotes .
Worked for about for a month, then disappeared from the MyQ app. Now the unit will not connect to my opener again.
Works perfectly.  Took 15 minutes to install with help from the well done videos and and instructions on the app.  Would highly recommend.

The app is consistently slow or just completely crashes. There are times when the app shows the door as closed when it’s open and vice versa. It beeps incessantly. In addition, the regular remotes no longer connect, so we can only use the app. This was a complete waste of our money. I spend a ridiculous amount of time sitting in my driveway waiting for the app to stop spinning so I can open the door, or waiting for the door to close after 100 beeps and flashing lights

MyQ Smart Garage works awesome.  Super easy to install and it works great so far.  Each of my family members has access so we can open/close the door as we approach home.  Got a great deal at less than $30, but was disappointed an additional sensor was almost the same price as the entire system was.
I found it very easy to install, had it working in less than 20 min.  Setting up the alerts was the tricky part but even that wasn't hard.  I love it so far.
Worked perfectly. Installed in 15 minutes. I can now set times to auto close the garage door if it’s open, see if I forgot to close it, and close/open it from anywhere.

So convenient!!!  It’s nice being able to open the garage door when I’m away to let people in and be able to close it right after. Plus seeing how long it’s been since it was opened last is nice too.  Definitely easy to install and well worth the money!

Super easy to install. Works Most of the time -  not consistent. Sometimes the icon just spins. Can’t use it as primary opener - but still like it and quite happy.  Hopefully future updates will fix the iphone app.
The name of the product is larger than the things that it does. Tells you if your garage door is open. sometimes is wrong.
Make sure you realize there is no instructions in the box you upload them through the My Q app. Works great especially for retrofitting older style openers.
I like the alert feature that lets you set alerts when the garage door is left open - you can close the garage door from your phone from anywhere.
MyQ works but I thought this also supported HomeKIt. It does if you buy another bridge. But still it works flawlessly and I love the ability to be able to adjust the schedule.
It's really easy to install... A totally non technical person could do it..It doesn't integrate with Alexa at all which is complete bs
Great for checking being able to operate my garage doors remotely.
This is great product, it was simple to install and connect to my network. The fact that works with older openers is great.
A gave it only a one because after I purchased it I found out the service is not available in my area. I retuned the purchase.
Its very effective and easy to use.I don't have to push the keypads anymore.I can now easily monitor if the garage door is closed securely through the app

The unit worked fine. But then m keypad remote stopped working. Tried several times to configure both, and only one would work at a time. Sent a notice to Chamberlin, and did not receive a response. Poor customer service.
If it worked consistently I would love it! However that is not the case. I have paired and re-paired to no avail.  Some days it works and other days not at all. So disappointing and frustrating.
They removed support for wink and it has been at least three months and they are unable to fix this. Will probably return this.

It does not work with Alexa or Apple Home. Limited to the Chamberlain App only. If you walk/drive  out of your garage and cut the safety beam it blocks the app from opening or closing the garage until it times out. The regular remote will close it without that limitation.
sometimes it works some times it doesn't.  very inconsistent on the closing.  it will open almost every time but will only close once and a while.
Really like being able to control the garage using my phone. I can open it for my kids even if I’m not home.  Wish I could adjust the volume of the warning siren when the door is closing.
Very easy  to install and worked perfectly out of the box. It’s a very nice feature to be able to check on ones garage door from any where.

I love the notification (open/close garage door), it was easy to install and configure.  However I was not able to make it work as a remote garage opener with mine (overhead garage door brand) which caused to lose one star
Basically you just swap it with the old unit. Looks nice and works well.

I know what it’s like to have a working smartphone garage door opener, and this my friends is not such thing.  I have been LOCKED OUT OF MY HOUSE on multiple occasions because the sensor is no longer communicating— MF’er I don’t give two hits about the sensor, I just need a simple smart phone garage door opener that directly dupes a single button opener.  I would have exactly that simple thing if Chamberlain’s “smart” technology didn’t force me to use this unreliable garbage
Item never paired with garage opener. My opener was manf.  In 2007.  Easy to install but help instructions in”pairing” did not help. Item returned.
What I like most about this is I can glance at my phone to see if garage door closed. In past I’d make a drive around block to make sure. What a timesaver and peace of mind!
So far so good.  I am using two separate units.  I love the notifications that I receive on whether garage door was left open

I've installed them professionally for a few years now using alarm.com. I just purchased this for my parents and set it up using the myq app. It was very easy and the device responds quickly using the app.
This is to add another garage door to the MyQ hub control.It came with some loose part in the device but it works fine so I didn't bother return it.
Glad I purchased it. Took a lil while to be able to get it due to low stock but i am glad i was able to get it. Works perfectly

be very careful without an additional bridge this only works with there app not Siri so while driving you have to open the app and open the door.  this is not worth the danger time effort.  it's just a wifi bridge no any kind of integration
Works well.  Need to follow exactly the video instructions. No voice control such as Google or Alexa. Just Apps control.
So far so good. The only complaint is the delay when closing, but that’s a safety feature. Works for what it’s intended for. Will update if anything changes.
I added this to my daughters older garage door. This was a breeze to install and setup. It took me longer to mount it to the ceiling than anything else.

Love the ability to verify and open/close from the entire world.  The instructions are a bit dodgy but the videos are great.  Use them.  Pay attention to every word and do not connect to a switched outlet.  This will make you think the unit is defective when it isn't.  I would recommend this item to anyone who can drill a hole, use a screwdriver and follow instructions, carefully!
Waste of money. It works when it wants. Kinda of a pain to use.
Perfect for all garage doors. Works great. Don't need to buy more garage door openers as everyone in the family can use the app and open and close garage.
Wow! Indeed it was easy to install. Followed instructions step by step. I have not try it with Alexa maybe in the future
This works really well and was easy to setup. The complete let down is the extra added costs for features like IFTTT and Google that should be usable at no monthly cost.
Does not integrate with Alexa without a subscription.  If you are look for an opener to use with Alexa there are alternatives that do not require a subscription.
A little hard to install customer service is very good they try to help me Connected to my device and still it does not work

I do not recommend. Every time I've needed it to work I have to restart my phone. I do not feel comfortable at all just having this as an opener. Plus when you close the garage it beeps for 20 seconds prior to closing. It's so annoying.
Very easy to install, it took me 15 minutes, it connected quickly to the network, the application is easy to configure and the alerts work correctly.

we were able to hook it up to our very old (20 years at least) door.  all the  instructions were totally right.  just attached the control box to season, hooked it up to the internet, attached the door sensor and we were going.  our daughter was able to open the door from college.  working great about a month afterwards also. great product, solved all sorts of issues for us getting into garage
This is the BEST thing ever. I cam check that my teenagers have shut the door as well as myslef when I just can't remember. Love this thing!
Works great, only issue is the device says the door is open when it is actually closed. Not often but enough to loose one star.
Good addition to my garage door. I am still able to use the current opener remotes and like that I can also use my phone to open and close the garage door.  It was very easy to install.

This was super easy to install. The only problem is you can reset you other opener devices. You can allow up to three guest to use the app. It does have a loud beeping before closing which is a safety feature but not annoying loud. Has a open/close history and other settings and notifications.

Easy install to ceiling and second receiver on the garage door.  You will need an open outlet near your garage door opener.  Download app.  Controls your garage door on your phone.  You can set schedules to close automatically if open and you can set alerts.  And you can open remotely if you need to let someone in.
Worked well for both my garage doors.  Nearly instant response on my phone when garage door open.  Very impressive.
Initially, I had issue with the unit. The one Amazon sent was used and maybe it was not reset properly. After 3 months of struggle I was able to get it up and running. Now no issues!

Great product...easy set-up once you have to download directions from website...great step by step tutorial videos...ONE BAD PART...NOT SUPPORTED BY AMAZON IN MY AREA...called and they make sure to mention that it says check select areas 3/4 of the way down the page past advertisements and other garbage...doesn’t offer in initial item description
Smooth operation. It would not interfere with your normal activities, but just add the smart functions. Highly recommend. Integration instructions are clear and thorough.

This device works as designed but if you want other family members to get alerts or have the same access as the main user then this product is not for you.  There is a "Family Share" access level but is useless to allow trusted family members to have complete access.  Poorly executed app!
I love the fact that I can open and close my garage door with my phone from wherever I am. Also love that I can look and see if the door is actually closed.
Was able to install this unit in minutes. Although getting an added person to use the app was very difficult.
This My Q universal smart garage door opener would not sync with my garage door opener, and it’s a craftsman from the year 2000.
Super easy to set up and install.  Awesome features, we are extremely happy with this purchase.
I had smart openers at my old house and wanted to convert the ones at my new home and this was the perfect solution. Works great and easy to set up.

Plugged in, connected to Garage door programming and then wifi password - it was truly plug and play.  Mot difficult thing for me was getting to those high ceilings and screwing it in next to the opener.I love the knowing when the door is opening (most importantly closing).
Sounds simple. If you just follow the instructions and you have a strong WiFi signal, this device works well. If your WiFi us weak, don't blame this device.  Good product
The best thing about this product is that I can verify if the garage door is closed even if I'm not home, the one dislike is that the amazon key feature is not working in our area.
This is to replace my garage remote, new car has sensors all around and seem to be blocking the garage remote signal. This has mad it easy to open and close garage with out using remote.
So easy to use if you follow directions. I set alerts for both open and close. Make second guessing a thing of the past.
This has been perfect for having a motorcycle.  I can open my garage door without getting off my bike!!! A real Must Have for someone with a motorcycle!

Concept is great, though I had difficulty getting it to work consistently. Once I found out that I had to pay for ifttt integration, and found out that it only was working some of the time I returned it. Believe there are issues with the sensor to hub communication.  Was relatively easy to install, had to move the hub several times, then flipped it 180 degrees which improved the communications. Unfortunately for something as important as a garage door, anything less then 100% accurate is not acceptable.

The device works with Google Assistant exclusively to close the garage door or provide a live status if the garage door is open or close. You can't use a voice command to close the garage door. Right now MyQ is not compatible with Amazon's Alexa. One other feedback is the LED indicator on the hub is so dim. Better to have a brighter LED to get a status of what is going on with the setup etc.
I purchased this product to open and close garage door from myQ App. This is not working as I expected. I don’t recommend this product to other persons. It is a bad product.
Easy to install. Phone app simple to install. Alexa.... not so simple. Still working on that one. I have an echo 8.
If your wife and daughter have claimed the only two garage remotes fro your house then this is a must have!
Easiest and fastest install.... Works like a charm, one of the best smartlife products...

Chamberlain Hub works as advertised.  Couldn’t be happier. Took about 30 minutes to install. Step by step video is very helpful. Directions recommend Hub be installed 4 to 6 feet from garage door motor. Had to install Hub across garage on opposite garage wall (18-20 feet away) for power source and had no issues with pairing Hub to garage motor.
My purpose was limited to wanting to know whether my Garage door was open or closed.The other features were not very clear to me in the instructions.

The install instructions with embedded videos were great! As long as your WiFi can reach your garage, there should be no issues. I don’t have the add-on enabled for using Alexa. I can see from anywhere (viaThe app)  whether my garage is open or closed. I even have it scheduled to close at 10 pm, if I forgot to close it already. Great product. I can’t believe how great it is given the cost.

Being able to close my garage from my phone has been great.  I play golf several times a week and I am able to put my golf shoes on and walk straight to the course out of the garage.  Before I would be in socks, go out the front door, lock the door and put my golf shoes on by my front steps.
very usefull when u cant be at home but can open from another place the garage to let your family or packaging in

So I was under the impression if I purchased this and the subscription I could do simple things like use Google Assistant and say "Hey Google, open garage door". That's not the case... it takes you into another menu where you have to ask it to open garage door and it doesn't work.  Pretty pissed I wasted my money on this.

After our daughter locked herself out of the house, we found this and thought it was worth a try.  It's GREAT!  Now we can open the door for anyone who may need to get into our house at any time.  Well worth it!

A few steps to get installed, but works great once you get everything mounted.  Been using for a couple months with no issues.  Used it to close garage without having to get up.  Guy showed up unexpectedly to work on home and was able to open garage to let him in.  Sends notification of garage left open.

It Too many quirks and you have to have everything exact position can’t work with LED lighting around it and too many walls which is very very delicate I wish it would work I really do because I love the idea and it does not work with Alexa yet through voice command I called customer service they were very nice BUT we wer in the phone for one hour and a half  and it really didn’t quite work like it should
Easy to install and setup, was ready in 15 minutes. Works perfect.

I had another type of opener that didn't work very well.  Took a leap of faith to try a newer one.  This works great, hasn't failed once.  4 stars instead of 5 because it doesn't integrate with with Alexa.
