I bought this as a gift for my husband. Install was very easy & we are very happy with it. On the app you can easily see if your door is open or closed, and tap to open or close it. Works wonderfully!
It will open the garage but won’t close it so useless. It was bought for my second door and while the main unit works, the second one just doesn’t.
Good product but needs some work. Subscription fees are out of control and to charge to use a free software integration is a bit ridiculous

Amazing!!! My garage door opener is dated so rather then spend $300 for a new one you get this guy for $40. And amazon delivery?Tbh the in home delivery creeps me out a bit but the garage one is super safe and I’ve done it several times already

Communication with phone sometimes lacks, but it's great to have and know garage opened or closed being able to let people in and out with passing around the garage opener or giving keypad code and wondering if they closed garage when they left, the beeping when closing is the most annoying part but worth it
It doesn't work and very confusing instructions. Don't know how to delete it if it was loaded wrong

Awesome product! It took me a little while to get it to work with my garage door opener that is 20 years old, but once configured, it is an excellent product. One of the things that I realized, is that you need to mount the wifi HUB at least 2 feet away from the garage door opener. If you do not, you will get interference from the garage door opener and generate errors on the app and will not work.

If you are installing for 1 door garage, it's perfect - easy installation. However, if you have 2 door garage, the signals from the sensors get crossed and caused the sensors to be confused.  I still have not been able to synchronize my 2 garage doors separately so that they will open and close properly.  I'll update when I resolve this issue.

Super simple to instal. From opening the box to installed and working it took me maybe 30 minutes. Great value! No more getting locked out of the house. Now I can access my house with my phone and I didn’t have to purchase a more expensive smart door lock and bridge for remote access. This device allows me to open and close the garage from anywhere! Just used it the other day while out of town to give access to my house through the garage. Brilliant!
Works great. Love the alerts for when door opens. Also know when people are getting home or heading out.

The unit is small and can be installed on a beam, WiFi needs to be strong enough to reach your garage area, easy setup to MYQ application on I-phone. I have it for two days now and love it so far. I set it up so I can get alerts when the door is opened, great feature.  Installation took about 20 minutes, make sure you know your WiFi network name and password, and have tools readily available.
Works great! Only thing I wish is that it incorporated with Apple HomeKit out of the box. Still a great buy.
Returned it , poor WiFi integration, could not get it to connect, can’t even comment on if it would work...

Everything was great until the door opened itself in the middle of the night twice. First time we though it was maybe a glitch and gave it more time. We disconnected it when it opened a second time without being asked to.
Very easy to program and install. Worked the first time and was easily able to log in and add more phones to the system.

This is easy to install and easy to use.  The Android app also allows you to view the door position and open and close the door.  It also shows how long it has been in the current position.  Very cool.
I had some problems adding the MyQ hub to my network but after talking to Chamberlain tech support it was added easily.  It works like a champ!  I have not added it to Alexa's inventory as yet.
A great idea. Has about a 30% or less success rate. My internet strength is fine. It just doesn’t stay connected.

I have a very old garage door opener that can't be controlled digitally. I was aware of this when I ordered the MyQ.What I purchased it for is to be able to be notified when my garage door opens or closes and this it does perfectly.

This product works very well. It was easy to install the instructions guid you once you down load the app. I feel its more secure then having a garage door open that can easily be stolen from your car. The garage door opener also runs out of batteries. I would highly recommend this product.

Ok so preface - it works, and it was easy to set up. If that's all you care about, this product is fine.The real issue comes with its reliability and its app. The app randomly forces you to log in again (this is likely due to my phone's clearing of temporary data, but it's something I wish they'd handle better). Sometimes the app is unresponsive and if their servers go down (they did one day) you can't open your door. All of these things point to the core issue which is that although it would be convenient for this to work over 4G from anywhere in the world, there needs to be a local access mode that works over your wifi. Most of the time you use this, you'll be in your driveway. There's no reason it shouldn't just send a command over your local network using a secure token.

Easy to install and up in a few minutes. The only improvement could be to add it to Alexa so that it can be opened using voice command. The integration with the Xfinity App is cool but couldn't integrate with the alarm system. Something I would be looking forward to.

My only issue right now is that it doesn’t integrate as smoothly as I expected with alarm.com and an existing z-wave system. So can’t remote control everything from one app. Haven’t tried Alexa with it.
I had to try a number of times for MyQ to sync with my chamberlain garage door opener, since then it works great. Closed the door from 1000 miles away when I noticed it open on my camera.
I Love this product because it works well with smart phones. I don’t like that once you invite a person and they accept, you can not take their access back.
I don't know why I waited so long to get this in my house. Great product, really easy install and it works perfectly.
My nephew installed for me ... took less than 30 minutes.  I set up alerts ... very easy.  This is def an upgrade for my home.
Really easy to install and get working. The alarm when the door shuts is a little annoying but nice for the warning I guess.

This has been a fantastic device. It was very easy to set up - just a couple of screws. The part that goes on the garage door is battery operated and doesn't need any physical connections; the larger box simply plugs in to the wall. The technical work of connecting it to the cloud went smoothly and I had no problems getting the app on my phone to control or monitor the door. The alerts are a huge help; I never have to worry that I (or anybody else in the family) left the door open. All in all a simple and useful addition to my home.

Before I found this, I’d get 3-4 blocks from the house and begin wondering if I shut the garage door. I’d return to find it still open about 2% of the time—just often enough to keep that anxiety alive. This allows me to have peace of mind knowing I shut it, and the ability to close the door if I forgot.
I love the geo fence feature. Just roll up to my house and it opens for me. The amazon KEY feature is awesome too. No more worrying about thieves.
Perfect product it make it easy to used I can used it with my Apple Watch I’ m super happyRecommended

I’ve been watching this item and had it saved for later for a while. I could not see myself paying $199 for the ability to remotely close my garage door via WiFi. The price dropped to $49 and to me, it was with it. This is perfect for me since I was not looking to add Alexa or Google integration. This along with a ring flood light by the garage door. You’re all set.
This thing is awesome, now I can operate the garage door using my phone and not get locked out of the house.

I was having problems with my garage door opening on its own. I now can check any time to see if it's closed, and close it remotely if necessary. And the icing on the cake is that Amazon can now leave my packages inside my garage where I know they are safe and out of sight. The investment was definitely worth it. And it was very easy to install/set up.

I travel for work so it is great to have a way to know my garage door is closed or to be able to open the garage door remotely.  I love the fact that I can set notifications for when the garage door opens.  The installation was simple; it took about 5 minutes.
I love it super easy to install works great I’ve had packages delivered everything is perfect I recommend to everyone

The product works great, but they charge $1 a month for Google Assistant support. And even then, the support is a janky integration where you have to tell google to talk to My Q, and THEN you can query the status or close the garage.You're better off just using the app.
Didn't work even on an advertised model. Called their customer support and was told this purchase was a waste of time.
Super easy to set up and install. Very helpful to know if your garage door has been left open for more than a couple of minutes. Love remote open or close. Wish it connected with Alexa.
Turns out I had to push the yellow button twice on the 8500 whereas the other opener just need one purple button push. Since then everything has been working fine.
Works great, love the app. No more worries if I left it up when we go out.

Bought used dispite reviews of issues not being able get unit to work due to prior install. For me the unit worked as should and was up and running in 20mins. Very convenient to be able to use my phone to open garage door and also the fact that I'm able to add guests to the account.

Extreme poor integration with Google Home. Extremely disappointed with myself selecting this product.  I do not even call this integration..  Moreover, we purchase these products so that we enjoy the Internet of Things...  This product asks you to activate subscription.  I will not recommend this product if you plan to integrate it with Google Home.
Install went without a hitch and everything works. As others have mentioned, I wish there was more integration which is the reason for minus 1 star.
Dry easy to install and turned my garage to a wireless garage. I highly recommend it.
The instructions that came with it did not make it easy to install.  It was necessary to pull up the instructions online, since they provided more details and specifics.
I have conectivity problem, I dont know why in some time of the day it appears offline and it gets online again itself in any moment, but it fails everyday in the morning
Fast and easy setup. Haven't tested to see if Alexa compatible but works great!

The app and the product really sucks. Once you sync your garage opener, it disconnects every other opener you have I.e. car, key pad. Then sometimes it doesn’t even want to open, I almost got locked out because it refused to open and gave me an error.
I love it my stepdaughter and grandkids don’t always close the garage door  It alerts me whenever it’s operated when I’m away I can open or close it I’ve used it several times 👍

I was skeptical because you can buy one replacement garage door opener for $39 or you can buy this for the same price and close/open your garage from anywhere...people it works and was a quick install (about 10 minutes). I couldn't be happier. You can also schedule when to close and open the garage. great deal.
Got this to control the garage door from my phone so I don't have to leave an opener in the car. Works like a charm.

The instructions tell you to download the MyQ app first. The myQ app has installation instructions including videos. It was amazingly easy, just follow the step by step instructions. Luckily my home router wasn’t strong enough to reach the garage. App works great, very pleased.
I like this device. Install was a breeze. However I have had issue with the app. Can't reset my password and inviting others to use has not been a success

So far so good, easy install & hook up to WiFi, used on double car door so only one sensor needed & easy install as well, fairly good instructions & support from My-Q folks, comes w/ever thing U need but tools.
Easy installation and good price, works fine after few months of the installation

I bought this in December of last year and took just got around installing it. I have been struggling with this for more than few hours and could not get the App to work. Looks like I need to switch off every other device for this one to work! Waste of money and since I took so long to install it cannot return the product either!
I love this app but it doesn’t work for my roommate. Can’t add him into my friends list to authorize???

It took minutes to install and works as promised.  On the app you can see if your garage door is open or closed.  You can also operate the door from the app and your keypad and openers all still work as well.  Peace of mine as I always get to my destination and can't remember if I shut the door.  It also gives me peace of mind as an alert pops up on my phone if the door is opened.  I highly recommend!
One of the best purchases I've ever made. It works as described and the installation was super simple. Honestly I should have gotten this thing a long time ago but am glad that I finally did.
I'm just going to say wow I have a Genie garage door opener and this works like a champ easy to set up awesome thank you myQ

I like being able to tell if I forgot to close my garage door or not. The price was good and installation was not the easiest. I’ve had it now for a couple of months and there of been several Times that the app was unable to close my door while I was away from home. It needed to be reset by closing locally. I have also had to re-program the garage door opener to the MyQ at least four times. It’s definitely not dependable.

Do not follow the video for installation.  The guy in the video puts the sensor in the wrong spot. Once I fixed that, the opener has worked 100% of the time. I hooked it up through Amazon Key, so deliveries made by Amazon can be placed in my garage so that porch pirates will wither and die. I also have it hooked up with wink so when I get home I push one button and my door opens and lights in the house come on.

Really glad we bought this. An elderly parent locked themselves out by accident, now we can remotely open the door for them. Works great, just today I opened the door for a visiting relative who arrived while we were gone.

Definitely recommend! We have been out of a garage opener for some time and I feel I chose the best one. Love that it is compatible with most garage door systems and the set up is simple, also the app includes step by step instructions

We have Overhead Door Garage Door Openers on both of the doors.  The MyQ system worked perfectly and was easy to install.  We can now control both doors using the app on our iPhone as well as check the status of the doors.  "Did we forget to close the garage door" is our equivalent of wondering if we left the stove on.

Excellent product.  I bought to add a second door sensor to my Chamberlain system that only includes one door sensor.  Works great!  Love being able to see when or IF my door is open, from anywhere in the world.  And control it as well.
I had to replace one of my two 10-yr old openes which had wifi, but not MyQ.  Both the old one and the new one now seem to work well with the hub.
Awesome gadget. Highly recommend. Had no idea it integrated with Alexa until this review however I'm sure it's easy & will work.

After two months of working great this device is junk. Loses WiFi connection multiple times per day. Needs powered down or reset to work properly. I’ve moved the unit closer to my WiFi (although it worked for the first 2 months fine), I’ve reset the hub, wiped it clean and began anew...still disconnects multiple times per day. What a waste!

Install was easy except for a minor hiccup. The door sensor would not pair with the app. The app gave some error.Replaced the sensor battery, still no dice. Out of options, closed the app and restarted it and this time it paired.

Working very well so far.  Easy to install.  Does what it says it will.  Sometimes the app thinks it didn't close/open the door when it did but other than that little glitch (which hasn't proven to be a problem thus far) it's great.  Allowed me to not have to worry about keeping my garage door opener in my car in the drive at night.
No voice command to open the garage door with Alexa or Google.  They say it’s a security issue.  So just disallow and voice command using the word garage and let other voice commands work!

My bad for not reading more.  This doesn't work with Alexa, or I haven't figured it out.  The app works fine, but I really thought it was going to work or I would have chosen a different model that works with Alexa or SmartThings..
Fairly easy to set up but doesn’t work. Deleted and set up again but still nothing.

Great product! Works as advertised. Can open garage door remotely from anywhere as long as you have data connection on your phone. And ofcourse, MyQ needs to have your home internet connection up and running at all times for it to work. Gives you an update whenever garage door is opened and closed. One of my best buys from Amazon!
Simple to install and to add a second door module.  Works great  and we have the peace of mind knowing we can verify the doors are closed from our smart phone.

From the ad that convinced me to buy, to the app which was very logical with step by step videos and printed information, to the actual installation. Everything worked as advertised! It took about 30 minutes for me and should be less for more technical people. I hope for continued good performance.

Absolutely my second favorite home automation device (my thermostat is my first). Very easy to install and just works. I get notifications every time it goes up and I can easily check the status from the app anywhere in the world (that has internet service).
works so nice and so easy to install. I just love the product
For the dollar. This system is amazing. Took maybe ten minutes to install. Set up schedules so if you left the door open it will close automatically. Simply works perfectly..

Wanted something where I could let in friends when we were away from the house. This has made it easy for us to allow friends to come by and check on things if we were out of town. Also, it helps me make sure I haven’t left the garage door open and if I have to close it remotely.
This unit was extremely easy to set up and install. Works as advertised even with a 12 year old garage door opener
Used to add to the MyQ installed system for the second garage door. Unit installed and connected easily. Can operate either door independently from MyQ app.
I love the security of knowing the garage is closed.  This has given me peace of mind.  Especially when we go out of town.
It works really well. It is easy to set up as long as you check all the instructional boxes.
Easy to install and works as expected.
This product is a great, reasonably priced solution for never doubting whether you closed your garage door or not. We love it!
This is MyQ #2.  I couldn't pair #1 to a new router because of a serial number mix-up. This  one paired easily  in a few minutes. No more trips around the block to make sure I closed the garage door.

I think this would be a great product if it did not continue to drop the wi-fi connection. It Is within 50ft of my router but I have to reconnect the wifi connection several times a month. Otherwise, it’s easy to install, works great when connected and Amazon has used it to drop off packages in the garage which is awesome. You just never know if it will be reliable when needed.

Super easy to install and connect.  Probably the best deal in home automation.  Converted my 25 year old garage door openers to get monitored and controlled by my iPhone from anywhere.  Bought a second one for my daughter 👍👍👍
This thing is  terrible !  I’d say it works about 25% of the time and always errors out !Do not buy this.  You will regret it as I do !
Works perfectly with my iphone. Setup was a breeze and myQ app installed on iphone w zero problems. 1-06-2020
Works good when it wants to. Constantly getting a close error and I’m unable to open or close my garage through the app and have to use my old garage clicker which defeats the point.
Works as advertised used with two garage doors with Precision Openers and a Liftmaster Driveway Gate.
So easy to install and love it because it is so easy.

the system is great if it could work the way it supposed to.  I can get to open the door but not close it or the other way around I can close it and will not open shortly after I have done the previous action.  Not sure why it will do one thing quickly and not do the other after.
Had a difficult time  installing it . Still trying to figure it out . Instructions need to be user friendly
Solved!!! That horrible question, did I close the garage door or not??? Never again!!!!Also, great support possibly the best phone support I’ve ever received!
It was a dud out of the box.Poor tec support.

This is an awesome product, easy setup and install, and the MyQ app works every time like a charm. The custom alerts notify me of my garage opening & closing activities. Very easy to send access to a family for use as well. I haven’t figured out the Alexa integration but I love it nonetheless.  I Highly recommend this product

I installed this and it will close the door, but won't open. I have it tied to my Google Home that is tied to my MyQ account. When I tell it to open the door, all it does is tell me the door is closed, like I asked it for a status. If the door is open and I ask it to close it, it does that just fine.
Great to have a back up if I want to open the door for a delivery or check to see that I didn’t forget to close the door! It was very easy to install and a great price!

I have a direct drive Liftmaster 3800.  For some reason, myQ is not recognizing it.  On the box, MyQ says that it is compatible with any brand with safety reversing sensor, which my Liftmaster does.  So, right now I am stuck in the installation.  =(
Not sure how Alexa works but the app is sometimes is not as good as it should. You have to press it a few times 2-4 times to get it to open.
It only works half the time and sometimes it opens the door on its own then has an error code that won’t clear.
Took me 20 mins to install everything, I have had this for a lot a month, and have had no issues.  Will be buying another one for the other side of my garage
I wish I would have known about this a long time ago. Easy to install (under 20 minutes) and easy to use. Love it!

Easy install and works fine so far. The only downside is you have to pay a fee to use it with Google home and even then the functions are limited. For example, you can't just ask Google to open your garage door.they say it's for security reasons. I understand that, but I'm also an adult that's capable of making my own decisions.
These work great and are not difficult to install.  I highly recommend these units.  I'm very pleased, and love the notifications I receive when either of my garage doors open or close.

Easy to install. When closing the garage with the app there’s an annoying beeping alarm to warn you that the garage is closing. Alarm lasts about 10 seconds then the garage door begins to close. No settings within the app to change this alarm feature. Wish I could change the delay time to close the garage and shorten it.
Excellent video instructions and worked seamlessly to make an old Craftsman opener "Smart" (green sync button).
Months after usage this little device is still functioning as expected.I have now twice forgot to close my garage, and myQ alerted me right after.
SUPER easy to install - was intimidated by some reviews - but we had no issues.Would have given 5 starts - but ran into issues immediately with Apple phone - Android was perfect.  Luckily we had it!
The Wi-Fi range is terrible, so it might not work in every garage. They probably used the Espressif garbage to cut corners in their design.

Love this thing.  As someone who tends to drive away and once miles down the road wonder if I remembered to close the garage door, this thing is the answer.  You can also set up alerts to let you know how long the door has been left open.

my garage door openers are 20 years old. I was worried that it would not work with such old door ops. The whole installation process took less than 15 mins. Worked so well, I purchased an add on for my 2nd g door opener. It installed just as easy. Now I can close the doors when my family leaves them open.

It took me three hours to install it. My Q couldn't detect my current garage opener, so I had to remove it from My Q account several times and start from the beginning.It works as expected, but it's a bit slow, and it's outrageous how you need a subscription for something as simple as opening/closing the door. Overall, for the price, this is a good opener and easier to use than others.

Great product. Unfortunately, ifttt doesn't link properly and there is apparently nothing Chamberlain can do about it. Ifttt has zero support. So I cancelled the membership that allows me to connect to Ifttt ($11 USD per year paid to Ifttt through Chamberlain).
It works ok. The App is slow to load and requires a passcode every time.In order to actually use with Apple HomeKit/Siri, you must spend another $70 to get a hub that only works with this.
Haven’t tried the Alexa integration yet but we love this product. Took a garage door opener and put it in my hand all the time ie my phone
This is super easy to install and is almost on the other side of the house from our wifi router, but has no problem reaching the router. Love the peace of mind and the ease of installation.

I always go out for biking/ walking from home so need open/ close the garage door very often. I usually have the remote control with me or hide somewhere. This is very good product you could very easily open/ close the garage door without remote and you could share this to your friends/ family. If you are handy, the install is easy! If you are not very handy! Please follow the video to install step by step. I spent around 25 minutes and I am not very handy. Thanks!
Works good, I can check to see if it's open and close it. Keeps a log when last used.
I just wanted a simply garage monitor to tell me wether or not I actually closed the garage. This does the job nothing more nothing less.
Yay, I love this. No more worrisome about a garage door opened at my moms place. That and the cameras allow us to control all the cars surroundings.

This thing works awesome. I am able to open and close the door with my phone or my apple Watch. Connecting to my wi-Fi Took about two tries, but I have not had a problem since. I plan on getting the home bridge attachment so I can control it with home kit.
Simple and easy installation and setup. The device has worked flawlessly. The app is intuitive and functions as intended/designed.
Very simple to install if you follow the directions. Love that we know when or if we leave the garage door open. Gives us sense of security when we’re not home

love this addition to my garage and security system.  puts my mind at ease when i feel like i have forgotten to close the garage door.  I love how i can be out and check my garage door to make sure its closed.

The item worked just as described.  Setup was fairly straight forward.  I did make one adjustment.  Instead of installing the Hub on the garage ceiling, I attached it to the side bracket holding up the garage door opener.  This is near the power source and presented me from having to drill the bracket into the ceiling.Installation 2 weeks ago and not a single issue since!
I installed this two months ago and it says it needs a new battery already. Not cool. Installation was pretty simple however and it worked pretty good but not flawless.
Easy installation.  It works as described.  Most challenging part was getting it find a WiFi signal but when that was overcome it installed and works great!

If you have a MyQ liftmaster without WiFi, you may need to follow a step that isn’t documented. Call support if you are doing everything documented, sensors connect but liftmaster won’t connect to hub.
This one will tell you position of garage door no matter what app or device is used to open or close the door.

Easy to install and works wonderfully while it works.  I've had it installed for about 3 months and now it seemed confused on if the door is open or closed. Changing sensor batteries and reprogramming fixes the issue for maybe a single day
Works Excellent as described ❄️❄️❄️❄️❄️Best one out there for the Money just follow Directions .......
Definitely more convenient than buying a remote. Easy to setup and easy to use. Love this remote on my phone.
Giving it 4 stars because even though it works as advertised, there is no way to turn off the annoying alarm when closing the garage.
Any issues customer service can help you super fast other than that it works excellently and it's perfect
Very simple to install. Works great. I have not paired with Alexa yet but don’t think there will be a problem.
Being able to control your garage door is great, but the Apple HomeKit integration is broken. It worked for a day, then quit. Very disappointing.
Ridiculously easy to install. Wish they would add alerts/timers....”door has been open x amount of time”...automate closing door at a certain time...Beyond that, it’s great!
I received MyQ yesterday, opened the box and read through the instructions.  II downloaded the app and completed the install in less than 30 minutes.  Everything is working as expected. Very pleased.
Very simple to install and works really well.  I’d give 5 Stars but Key Delivery isn’t available in my area yet :(.
Really easy to set up and install. Works great from anywhere and solves a lot of arguments between my grandpa and grandma.
Works perfectly for a very inexpensive price and easy set up. Unfortunately no Alexa integration though.

I have to say I am pleased with this product. Works well and is easy to set up. I have a very old genie garage door opener that I was skeptical it would work with but it did! Highly recommend. No need to replace the entire opening system just to have a way to control the door from outside the home via an app. Well worth the price.
Tremendous idea, but highly unreliable. Often shows status several hours old. Hope an improved model is available soon.

I got my device, had it installed and working in about 20 minutes!  It performs and does exactly what I want it to do.  A bonus advantage is that if I want to add things like a camera to my garage, it can integrate with the MyQ.  The best part for me is when I go for a walk, I don't have to hope that the pad on the outside of my garage will open or not!  MyQ works the first time, every time!  Well worth the money!

Installed in less than 15 minutes and it works great from what I can tell so far. Will come in handy when I have people that need to get into the house (and don’t otherwise have a key).The app is pretty barebones, but it gets the job done.
Love this garage opener. Best purchase. Only thing I dislike is if you want to connect to google home you have.m to pay a subscription from what i was told. :(

I love the warning that I receive that the garage door is open.  The MyQ unit was very easy to install and program.I wish that MyQ will close the garage door automatically after a sertain amount of time.
Awesome product. Super easy setup with steps clearly labeled. Works great!

Did not function out of box. Product is built well, but likely shipped a dead unit. If I have to go find batteries, it defeats the pricing and ease of shopping online. Would be nice to have a “tested product ship”
Easy to install and has worked well.I use the alerts and those have come through consistently with no problems. Wireless connection has been reliable.
What an awesome product. It certainly saves money and we didn't have to go buy a garage door opener that had the option built in.  I love that it works with both my phone and my Apple Watch.

This is very easy to install IF you download the smart phone app first and register. Then the app will walk you through the installation process step by step. I was able to connect to my WiFi with no problems at all. I have not had the hub that long but I love it so far. I love that I can schedule to put my door down at 9pm every night and I have verified it has gone down as expected.

I read some older review concerning the difficulty in getting the system to operate.  Well....I can say all the bugs are worked out....outstanding tutorial and step-by-step nanny-state style smartphone instructions made this a snap to install.

When I saw this on sale, I wanted to try it out.  I've had a fair bit of experience with deploying home automation gear but I was pleasantly surprise at how easy this was to install.  Very pleased with it.  And I love that fact that Amazon Prime members can use it to have their packages delivered inside the garage!
connected on my third door no problem.  integrated into the app seemlessly.i'm happy and didn't need to replace the rarely used opener.
What is product about 6 months ago working very well would  Recommend
Pretty easy setup with exception of having to call support.  Which was very helpful and resolved in 3 mins with a 2 min wait time two days after prime day.  Support gets 5 stars!
It was easy to install then I expectedGood signal

The app that goes with this called "myQ" integrates with Google assistant to close the door and send notifications to you, but it will not open the door with voice instructions as advertised.  It doesn't appear that Chamberlain is going to make any effort to fix this citing "security concerns" so I cannot recommend this product.
This unit works like a champ. Followed the directions in the app exactly like they were written and had it working and mounted in about 25 minutes.
Love it, easy to set up. Neighbor needed to get her Christmas presents, I was at work and wala opened it from my phone. Now they want one.

Had really inconsistent performance the first day after installing. The hub would get the command, but it couldn't send it to the opener for some reason. After the first day it seems to have fixed itself - somehow - certainly not through anything i did. But anyway it's working wonderfully now.

I really like this product. It does what I was wanting it to do. Installed to work with two Genie  overhead door openers. One is a commercial opener big overhead door and the other is a residential opener. Very pleased.
Works with Amazon Key, so I can have Amazon deliveries directed in my garage. Stops the Porch Pirates!

This thing is so horrible nothing I tried would make it connect to my garage doors even after searching online for a manual way to set it up even the manufacturers instructions were so inconvenient that it didn’t even explain how to initiate the programming mode returned immediately and I’m glad I did specially after reading that people were complaining that their garage door have been opening randomly
Works great for our garage door.  No longer do I have to wonder if I left the garage door open.  Wonderful.
Love love love this!!!!!!! So easy to install and what a great sense of security in case you forget if you shut the garage door or not and aren't home to do anything about it
Only a week in but works great. Cheap fix. Better than having to turn around because I forgot to shut garage door.....
The instal was simple and easy. Downloaded the app and it was working in about 5 Mins. One bad thing is it does beep when closing so that is very noisy.

I was looking for a Hide-A-Key solution for when my outdoor pushbutton garage door opener didn't work because it was too cold outside.  This is much better.  There is no key that can be discovered.  Also my daughters can open the garage door to park their cars when they come visit.  And as I jokingly told them, they can open the door for first responders when we fall and can't get up!

Easy to install and worked right off.  Had my first Prime delivery in my garage using the Key app that goes along with this.  Still working on a way to alert when it is open in the middle of the night.  i created a rule and plan to test it.  Good product.  Sharing with a family member to have access was little complicated, but we got it to work once i figured out what steps were involved.

Your internet has to be strong, it says two bar but I couldn't connect with any thing less than 4 bars but I love and that my daughter can have the app on her phone too so she can access my garage if I'm out of town.
Super easy set up and works awesome!  A great addition to your home and it you rent or move you can take it with you!! Easy!
This is very fast instaletion work good no drama
Very cool product, easy to use. Takes a few minutes to install and set up, but there is nothing difficult. Works great!
It was supper easy to install but it could cost a bit less. Great product. The second I bought for my second garage door.

Took me less than 15 mins to set this up. I have not set this to a hub so there is no monthly charge. The app can be used for all the functions. It would be great if there was a geo location functionality. Hopefully there will be an app update for this
I have integrated it yet with my opener.  I will try again soon.  I have a bad back which is holding me up.
Installation was straight-forward. Works as expected. No complaints at all, would definitely recommend.

Great idea, poor execution. It is impossible to keep this thing connected to the network making it essentially useless. I even connected it to its own router and placed it within 5 ft of it and it still disconnects and makes my doors offline. This is the only device that I have connection issues with.
Great way to access you garage via smart phone with another level of security when away from home

Would not keep a code.  The MyQ I had tool 5-10 minutes to finds my garage door opener, then after one remote open, the app would not retain the code.  Support didn't have an answer for this. So if you have a lift master, u might have this same issue.
This was awful to try to connect and install. Just a mess. I returned it after working with it after 2 hours.

Not the easiest set up if you have a Genie opener with intellicode but appears to be a very straightforward install with most other compatible openers.  App is pretty good and easy to use.Customer service was really helpful and instrumental in getting everything working.  So far so good.  Works as advertised!
Super easy to install and works like a charm.  I researched into several options and one was the best one out there.
PERFECT. One word to describe it. Finally fixed my wife's complaint/question of "did we close the garage door?".
This is the easiest Smart Home device I have ever setup. It took longer to mount the hub than the actual setup. Only been using it a few days,  but I am impressed so far.

Great product! Easy to install and setup. The app  dry user friendly. Turns your existing garage door into a “SMART” garage door. No more accidentally  leaving the garage door open all night. You can schedule it to close automatically if the door is open for an extended time or at particular time onf day. I would definitely recommend!
I could not get this to work and was unable to get any tech support to help me. I tried emailing for help with no response, and was unable to contact live person.
So far so good! The only thing that they don't tell you is that in order to use it with Google Assistant, you have to pay a subscription of $10 a year. Just FYI
We love these for our garage. They are so simple and convenient to use. Even if we have to open the door for someone when we are at work we can do it straight from our phone!
Does not integrate with Google no matter what it says. The service they used to connect has been shut off and no way to configure. Total crap.
Love this! Easy to install for a novice and works great!
Only took about 5 minutes to set up and about the same time for my daughter to get everything put in my phone.  Easy to set up and easy to use.  Very pleased
this didnt work well with my chamberlin opener, full of glitches with the software and syncingtried returning it and they wanted me to jump through hoops, ended up throwing it in the trash
Love this o know when not home if someone opens door. Sceptical about amazon delivery at first. Now I like it
Installation was too easy, thought I had missed something.  Directions were very easy to follow.  Like the app too.  Very pleased.
Easy installation, paired the hut as easy as piece of cake, took me only 15 minutes to finish. Opened and Closed the garage door with status is excellent.

I wish I did more research on camberlain before buying this. Integration with their opener was great, every other reason you would want to use a smart gadget is wrecked by greed and stupidity.Linking with home automation is a joke and they require a paid service to do so.

I installed it myself in about 15 minutes.  The only bad thing to report is I had to replace the battery in the receiver within a month of installation.  I was able to add it to my 3 family members cellphones so they can all gain access through their cellphones which is much easier than programming and buying additional garage door remote openers.  This is the way to go!
False advertising- doesn’t work as they say it does
Worst part is needing the drill bit (if you’ve never used a drill before. Otherwise, super easy to install
I really love that I can operate my garage from my phone. And, I can set notifications if it is open for a period of time. That is handy when someone forgets to close it.
It was very easy to install and works great. My husband loves it! No more worry about leaving the garage door open.
I have year 2000 Chamberlain garage door opener. The package says this remote is compatible to 1993 models. It didn't connect to my garage door opener. Had to return.

I had a hard time pairing it with linear garage door opener. Had to search online and use manual methods for establishing communication. Though I spent 2 hours installing it, product works smooth after that.
The sensor on the door constantly loses its link to the base hub.  When that happens, you can't open/close the door.  The online support is also dismal.
Best investment I have made. I contemplated changing my garage opener to a smart one. But this does the trick at 10% of the cost.

I got mine off the Treasure Truck. I found the directions well written and the install was simple. It took maybe 20 minutes. I don't need to keep the door openers in my car since I always have my cellphone with me. For the price I think it was a good value.
This thing is awesome.  Easily controls the door opening and shutting. As well as using the app (which is great by the way!) to double check if we left the the garage door open

Like many others have posted, it’s nice when it works but the sensors are only about 50% accurate. I called support and they told me to replace the batteries in my brand new units... I will simply just never buy chamberlain again, much easier...
Bought the "used" (dented packaging) one. Mistake! None of the fasteners were there. Nothing to mount anything. :(

Setup was easy, it took me about 30 min to install. I've wanted this service to go with my remote home alarm system, but it was more expensive than I wanted to pay in adding to my security bill. So this was a great option that I stumbled upon, and I'm grateful to have done so! So far so good👍🏽

Easy to install but it’s honestly terrible as soon as I did the install both my garage remotes stopped working and 80 percent of the time when I try to use my phone to open or close the garage door the app can’t connect. I’m taking it down

Received the product and installed per instructions (very easy).  Setup was quick and easy.  Works as advertised at a fraction of the cost of a Craftsman remote module for my opener.  Would buy again without hesitation.

I love this product very much. It is so helpful for us. Sometimes I do not know or remember whether or not my garage was close/open . I can simply use this APP to check and control it. While at work, My wife want me to open the garage for her . I can simply push the button to open it. This is the best toy for me to daily use. Thanks so much for this smart garage opener.
Works great easy to install, you tube videos made it crystal clear.Mobile app is surprisingly well made and easy to use.

Two days after I installed, Amazon delivered packages into our garage while were not home. I'm not the best at home projects, so it took me an hour including installing the MyQ and Key apps. The MyQ app gave great step by step instructions. Great for most. Some will need to improve WiFi signal in garage, or have an ancient garage door opener that does not synch. No such problems for us. Great solution.
I went on line to read about the nuances for installation. Simple but there should have been something in the box!!
The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because you can't link it to Alexa.

I Love the convenience of the MyQ.  I don't have to hear my family complain that they don't have a door opener because they all have it on their phone.  Make sure you read Steve's  review: 3.0 out of 5 stars What Chamberlain doesn’t tell you (and should!) because it will save you a bunch of heartache and make installation easy peasy.

Very happy with this purchase.  This is a very inexpensive way to give everyone in your household access to the garage.  Or to obviously open it for others if circumstances call for it.  Install was easy and straightforward.
Works great! Had to call customer service because the button on my opener had changed color. It’s been working flawlessly. Highly recommended.
A pain to setup, once it's setup works great. Works with Google assistant but not Google home. Integration could be better
Love this thing. Works great. Nice safety features. Cool notification system to let you know the door is open.

I'm always concerned that I didn't close my garage door at night or when I leave for work. Now I have it set on a timer to close at night and can check my phone and close it from work if I did forget. Installation was super quick and simple!
Works great by its self.  Want allow me to open the door with it and my car openers.  But reads when it its open or closed???
The package should say thumbs are the only requirement, opposable optional. Really straightforward, simple and great functionality.
Nothing but good things to say!  I just wish the extra sensor was more reasonably priced.
If only I had read that this one isn’t voice activated but for the price I paid no complaints
Excellent, worked fine . Easy to turn regular Garage door into WiFi garage door .
I would make it z-wave compatible.Since you can open a garage door remotely, I would ask one additional verification question, if your are not opening your  primary garage door.

Product works perfectly with one large exception. I am not able to add this to my apple home kit without purchasing a$70 hub. If you just want to be able to open your garage door from your phone when within wifi range it works well.Also, it does make a really annoying beeping noise for 20 seconds before the door closes.
I love this product package, you get everything you need to automate the garage door. Easy to install and so far works great. I love the alerts on status of the door in real time.
Delay in app to open and close. Functions does not work immediately close after open. Apps get freeze. Had to adjust couple of time to get function.
Easily installed.  Connected to Wi-Fi fast.  Only issue is it doesn't always notify when door opens (about 10% failure) unless someone used the app to open the door, then we all get notified OK.
Easy to install and set up. Really like the notifications for when my garage doors are open and closed.

I love this, as I have weak knees, and I find myself using garage overhead door more often.  I can enter at night, and close door, right after me, without waiting till I walk all the way into garage.  feel safer.  Took my buddy a while to get it installed, but, its great.
PROS...easy to install. Works well.CONS...No way to control volume on siren when closing. The pitch bothers my dogs. (I understand it is a safety feature, however it is annoying to animals)

Love love love this garage door opener. Easy to install and can be away from the home when my children come for a visit. I can open door from work many miles away. Loved it so much bought one for a gift for a friend.
Love this device! Very easy to install and setup and works great.  I was constantly forgetting whether or not I closed my garage when leaving my house, now I just check my phone and it shows me!
Easy to install and works as expected.  My only regret is that I didn't purchase the camera to support Amazon package delivery.  I plan to purchase and install it later.

The product was easy for me to install and program. It opens the door perfectly but has a hard time closing on the first try. Another issue is I can only have a total of 4 users. I have a family of 5 plus grandparents that come and go alot.
Don't have Alexa. Use it with a phone app. Works most of the time. Working off a repeater.
Easy to install. I don’t know why I didn’t get this when I got the opener , it’s a very handy option to have
Its does exactly what it is supposed to do. The only issue I have is it doesn't allow you to open your door half way for deliveries. Other than that its 5 stars
Easy to install. The existing myQ hub added it easily. Note: An existing hub is required.

The equipment would go offline frequently and would need a total reset. It also got hooked to one of the neighbors remotes on reset and that was another issue. I think the ones that connect directly to the motor are better. The door doesn’t open randomly any more.
Works fine and for the price you can't beat it
Nice to check if you left your door open without having to go check.
I was skeptic and hesitant about buying this given other reviews. Now i have 2 of these for my separate garage doors.The setup is very easy and straight forward.

Replaced a dead opener with this device.  Setup took all but 5 minutes.  Some advice would be to set up your account first online. The firmware update was easy after.  Overall this is an excellent after market device.
This sensor integrated with my MyQ hub without issues.  If I had a third door I would buy another.
WIFI connection was a little bit of a pain. need to have a really strong wifi signal  ear your garage.

This product works as advertised and took about 5 minutes to install. Super pleased with it and would definitely recommend it to others. Being able to monitor if the garage door is open and then to open or close it remotely is HUGE peace of mind.
Easy to install and works as advertised. Would definitely recommend if you’re in the market for smart control of your garage door.

Really easy to install, smart app, simple and well thought out instructions, but come on guys give me an Alexa integration. that can't be that hard.I have a Chamberlain Door Opener. I was done installing this in 30 minutes.
Love this item! Especially love that I can have the piece of mind after I check my phone to see that my garage is closed!

I just got this today, installed it, and was super impressed. It was very simple to install and works very well.  Now I can open my garage door with my smartphone, remote start my SUV, and warm the vehicle up in the wintertime before I even leave my bedroom in the morning.
I should have bought this years ago! Peace of mind, easy to setup, easy to use and alerts are spot on. Don’t hesitate. This is a must have for everyone. Even if you rent, get the added security.
Basic controller to operate garage door with cellphone. No bells or whistles.
Great opener, the app does lag and not open the door without having to close and reopen the app

Had no issues installing and configuring per the instructions and videos provided.  Added a second door sensor (MYQ-G0302), and again easy to install and configure.  Also, easy to configure the doors to close automatically every 30 minutes using IFTTT.com, all for no fees of any kind.  Feel good knowing that my garage doors will close automatically if/when we forget to close them!
Had to get a new garage door opener . The one we had through our alarm company was not compatible with the new door . This has work at great

It was very easy to setup even with my third party Garage door opener. I configured it with my Standard Drive garage opener and Fence gate (CSL24U). It took me 30 minutes co configure the Hub with these two items. Since then it is working fine without any issues. I am very satisfied withe the product so far.

I bought this on the prime day.  Based on the reviews, I expect to have a lot of issue install the device.  However, following the video on the app, it took me about 20 minutes to get it up and running.  Love it so far.  Before you start installing, watch the video a couple times to get yourself familiar with all the steps.  After that, it would be quite easy to install the device.  Have fun.

This thing has made me so happy. I can open and close it at distance and alleviate any "did I leave the door open" paranoia when away from home. I literally let a friend get into my garage and house to grab something while I was out of the country. The future is now.

It is a great product that seems to work seamlessly with my iPhone. I don’t care much that the company removed the Alexa compatibility though. The only reason that makes sense to do this is the all mighty dollar. $10 a year isn’t much, but it’s the principle.

So far, it’s doing what it’s supposed to do. Easy install. Don’t like using 2 small pieces of Velcro to mount the part on the door. Will see how it will hold. Only using it with my phone as of now. It’s great if you get locked out or if you want some one to have access to your house when your out. Must have internet working to use.
Searching MyQ sites/documentation says garage opener is compatible, but after install it just shows when it was last closed or opened. Waste of money for me

Reluctant to buy at 1st after reading some mixed reviews. Finally decided to give it a try. Glad I did. Just followed instructions and some advice from reviews and it worked flawlessly. So good that I bought another one for another home. Highly recommended.
Love that I can now get my deliveries in my garage! Works great when my daughters leave their keys at home, doors can remain locked and they use the app to open the door.

I don’t normally review products I buy but I feel I must warn other purchasers.The status of open/closed of the garage door is not correctly shown on App most of the time.  You could have an open garage but your App may show it closed.  This could be a security issue.  I will most likely return this product.
Very happy with the product.  No problems for us.  Make sure you have a strong wifi signal to the garage or you may have issues.
Was fairly easy to install. App setup took 3 attempts to connect on Android phone. Works great.
Easy install.  Let’s me know when garage door is open or shut, and use it as an additional opener
Amazon touts this for the in-garage deliveries, yet, it does not work with Alexa.  Very disappointed.
Works well by itself. Not integrated with other devices. Download app and follow instructions.

I ordered this product when it was on sell and I love it.Ive been waiting on the price to go down and it finally did,I used to have att digital life system which sucked,it always would lose signal and the app would crash all the time but this product and the app has worked flawlessly I highly recommend
Very easy to Install and gives a piece of mind to know the status from anywhere. Just be careful on the placement of the receiver unit. Follow the recommendation in installation instructions

Installation was quick and straightforward, with clear instructions provided through the app (including video illustrations). Every step worked on the first try. Alerts were also easy to set up and have worked as expected.
When it works it’s great but the sensor keeps losing the signal then a hour later connecting again.

Bought it for my garage. It is easy to install, with a good build quality. Doesn’t have many features and flexibility to control with home automation devices. Haven’t lost the internet connection since I installed it. Happy with the purchase.

This is one of the coolest products that I even bought. I was able to WiFi enable my 15 year old Liftmaster garage door opener in 10 minutes.  Also, I want to highlight that the distance between garage door opener and MyQ HUB could be as much as 9-12 ft  . Great product.
The product works fine, however; for some weird reason they stopped any compatibility with Alexa and SmartThings which is very disappointing.

good for the price, but so far im having few issues, sometimes the garage door is open but it shows as closed and cice versa, i have to close manually to have it as closed, sometimes it goes offline while the internet still working.
Easy to install. Must have a clear connection to your WiFi to work properly. Highly recommended.
Nice, very easy to install, works great
Works well for my needs adapted to My Q
Super easy to install. Has given me peace of mind when the kids are home alone.
Played around with it for a few days and haven't really used it after that.
Able to remote control and alarm after certain durations of being open and closed. Great addition to my garage and smart home set up.

Works well, but app functionality needs development. Can only have one login, cannot designate others to have access with own login. Update was promised in early 2017, but it is November and still no update to address these issues. So it works, but you will have to share the same login account with all users.
Worked when initially installed but it doesn’t close when using the app nor the car homelink remote. Anyone else experienced this?
Thought this was Alexa compatible. It is not. Wouldn’t have bought if I’d have know that.
This device delivers smart automation to your garage door. Works as advertised. Easy to install and program.
Great idea but crashes every now and then which makes it tedious to reprogram all of the time.

This is a great product. I’ve already recommended it to several friends. Installation introduction was very easy to follow, installation was simple and quick. 30 minutes tops.Sharing with guests, kids and Amazon delivery is very convenient.
I'm sure it works great but they dont tell you it's not supported in your area until you install it
Easy to install. I modded it so that light have external switch. Same goes for Buzzer
Unit was easy to install, fairly inexpensive but not compatible with Alexa
Installed on a Monday. Worked fine. By Thursday it "lost its connection" and it refuses to pair.
Super easy to install. The open/close detector just sticks on the door and connects wirelessly. It knows the doors position by it's orientation.
Love this product.  So nice to know if garage door is down.  It was a little hard to set up the first time, but now it works just great.
I was hesitant at first, buying this used item. But it all worked out fine. There are a few glitches when trying to close via google assistant. This could be due to the wifi signal.
could not connect to my secure wifi as it has no MAC address  it looks like it had all the features I was looking for  to bad
Simple installation and setup. Works great! Now everyone in my family can open and close the garage from anywhere. And we set it to automatically close at night in case someone leaves it open.
Very easy to install and very useful to provide a peace of mind while you are away form your home.
Advertised by amazon , used on amazon key but doesnt have Alexa compatibility,  extremely disappointed
This is a great devise. It gives me peace of mind and it was so easy to install. love it and I would recommend this to anyone.

Although I've only had this device for a short time, I have been very pleased.  I've long wanted the capability to check on or operate my garage door remotely and now I can!  I am using this with a Craftsman opener that is 17 years old and it works flawlessly thus far.  If there is a disappointment, it would be the need to pay a nominal fee to use this with the Google Assistant or any other service.
Crazy easy to set up, really enjoy the comfort of knowing the garage is closed, since we forget to close it too often.

I installed this about 70 feet away from my router and it still gets a signal.  I like being able to see if AND when the garage door was activated from anywhere (on my phone app).  Also, I have used it to open the garage from miles away when I needed to.  I haven't spent time to get Alexa to work with it yet.

Works very well and very easy to install. I had considered purchasing a WiFi deadbolt lock but this was much more cost effective and the hub does not require batteries. Works with my wink home automation system as well.

I love this product.  Do not like the fact that Chamberlain charges for IFTTT access and may be cancelling it as there is very little in built applets.  The product itself works great along with the app.  I would give this a 5 star rating if they had free access to IFTTT

Changed my life! No longer do I have to worry about my deliveries being stolen. With this and Amazon key they will leave your deliveries inside the garage. But in all honesty, the best thing is having the peace of mind that you didn't forget to close the garage door!
I am very impressed with this product.  Very inexpensive, very easy to install, very easy to use.  The best part is it works well too!
It works great and I like the ability to check the door when away from the house. I like it so much I purchased a second one for my daughter.

With MyQ you Never have to worry about “did I leave the garage door open?”The unit also helped out one day when a contractor showed up early and I was not home.  I was able to open the garage door remotely for him.  Really useful!

We love this, we use it for Amazon Garage Delivery the most but have used the app to open, check, and close the garage door.  Very easy to install with our Genie garage door opener as we following the instructions.
Works fine.  Our garage door didn't have an electric eye for safety......now it does.  Tg

This is a really good remote garage door opener. Very easy to install and setup. Need to make sure it works with your garage door but seems to work with most doors made after 1994. I believe this to be the correct year.

The applications are always complaining about the door not responding though the WiFi and everything is just fine. Mostly hit or miss for us while trying to open the garage either from iPhone or watch app.

Thank you for this affordable device that answered my needs. One time I was out of town and my son called me from school “Dad, not sure but I think I left the garage door open...” Also, the keypad sometimes no longer works. PROBLEM FIXED. Even has alert if garage is open or closed.

Since installing the unit, I have had numerous times where the garage door opened without use of the application or by garage door button. This made me question the security of this product. I inquired about this to the company, but did not get a response.
No matter what I tried I could not get this device to work with my WiFi. After 2 days of trying I returned it for a refund.
No matter what I tried I could not get this device to work with my WiFi. After 2 days of trying I returned it for a refund.
Works great, had one glitch the other day where it said door was open but it was closed.  Cycled door once and it was all set and worked fine since then.

Unfortunately this device is not compatible with a Liftmaster 312HM garage door opener. Support claims that this is a commercial opener receiver so that's why it is not compatible. But that means little to me as this is the garage door receiver I have for my garage door at my home.
Works very well with the WiFi system.
I can't believe how easy this was to install and how simple it is. The peace of mind knowing the garage is closed while we're away is worth it.
Broke after just 6 months. Battery died after 5 months that’s not a big deal. Contacted customer service nice lady said I should receive a replacement unit.

This is a good product. Easy to install and easy to use. However, the operation app can be improved more. First, if the app can link to google home would be better. Second, the app only adds three guests. It means your family members are limited under four people.

This thing works like a charm. I use it all the time. My original garage opener was worn and although I could get another one, I decided to try this out. It now has support for the Apple watch and I can open/close the garage with my watch!!! Additionally, you can set a timer to automatically close the garage door if you happen to forget to close it. If you are on the fence about this product, trust me....buy it!!
Only issue I had was Wi-Fi you had to  try it about five to six times and then it'll work.

This product continues to fail. I’ve had continuous issues since I bought this less than a year ago. The support team replaced the sensor for me and I still continue to have issues. I am seeking a refund at this point. You have been warned.
I wish I had been ordered this. It was so easy to install. Even lets me know whether the garage door is open or closed.
super easy to install, only takes 5 min for me to complete the whole installation. But I still cannot understand this stuff can't work with Alexa...

Did you ever leave home and get five minutes away and go oh no I can't remebmer if I closed the garage door??  If so this is great to check without having to turn around and go back home to check.  Also, you can close or open the garage doors remotely when needed.

Pretty easy to install and works perfectly. Alert everytime garage opens without fail. Had a couple issues where garage was open and no idea how it happened so got this cool gadget.  Well worth the peace of mind
Easy to install and excellent stuff for wireless to catch up with WiFi . Sensitive alerts and useful
worked great for long time , then all sudden stopped working and COULD NOT GET help from company to fix it ,
I didn’t work has I think, loss program, sensor error, removed from my account by it self, too many times in reconfigure. I don’t recommend.
Updates to software are annoying. Requires password re enter each time, PITA. I'd buy it again.
Nice functionality, great integration with existing openers. A definite must have in this day and time.
Not working well on remote control.
even though it tells me it is compatible with my opener it won't pair with the motor. Entered a chat a couple of times but didn't get any help
Won’t pair even w the same brand garage opener Chamberlain
Can now open and close the garage door remotely.  Helpful when I need my neighbor to check on something or grab tools
This has been a great way to receive packages!  I know exactly when they’re arrived and do not have to worry about weather or package pirates. I can’t wait to use this during the holidays!
Mine is great but it does tend to lose signal more often than I would like it needs to be able to walk on a channel
No more wondering if I left the garage open. Has saved me a few trips home just to check if it is closed.
works great, support is excellent, I had to call to solve a problem and they had all the answers
Smart garage door opener! Heck yeah!! Wait.. Doesn’t work with Siri you have to buy another device that costs more than this unit? Bummer. Hence the 4 not 5. But.. smart garage! Heck yeah!
When I called for support I was told I had to have 3-4 bars on my phone in my garage for the opener to work. What a waste of my time. I would never have purchased this had this been disclosed.
The app works great and it's nice to keep track of activity.  The install was easier than expected and the warning alarm before closing the door is an added perk.
This product stopped working after 1 month. It’s a lot of work to install only to stop working....
Easy to install. Easy to control. Great to get notification on garage door status. Pretty awesome!

Found out the hard way with syncing sensor to garage opener unit that sensor needs to be placed on the door.  This NEEDS to happen in order to sync correctly.  Wish instructions were more clear as it would saved me a lot of time.  FYI.
Really inexpensive at $20, and a breeze to install. Took less than 10 minutes to install.
I moved this device between 4 networks and only was able to connect with one. The antenna seems very weak.

Loving it.  You no longer drive away and wonder did your garage door close.  It also sends immediate notification when your door opens or closes and you have the ability to open or close the door from anywhere.

I gave it 4 stars because of the hassle to connect to my WiFi.  Not sure why, but this hub and my Chamberlain garage door opener both had problems connecting to my Linksys router.  I had to power cycle the router while the hub and garage door were looking for WiFi to get them to connect.  After that, they were great, and now I can’t live without them both.
Works well. Stupid that you have to pay to add it to your smart home network.
Got this so I can use my phone for the garage when on my motorcycle. Works good. Maybe a 5 second lag after you hit the button

Love that I can monitor and control my garage door.  Installation was easy AFTER calling tech support.  Wasn’t sure if my “learn” button was orange or brown, but came to find out from tech it was purple....certainly doesn’t look purple, but who cares:)
Could not get this item to work consistently with our garage door opener.  Too late to send back but it is worthless.
needed to replace an older version that was damaged.  Does what I want,  when I want it.
If is cheap product, it will disconnect you every week, and will take forever to reconnect it

I would give it a five, but I had to try multiple times to get to work.  It opened and closed the garage during the pairing phase, but sent a message saying that it couldn’t control the motor.  Very frustrating process, but it’s great now!
Had a few issues with the app had to delete and reload to get it to work properly but after that working great!

I had an earlier version, and while it functioned adequately for a few years, time took its toll.  It became so unresponsive that I stopped using it.  I recently decided to upgrade to the latest version, and I am delighted that I did.  Installation was simple, probably because a lot of it involved just removing the old unit and putting the new one up.  It is working wonderfully.  Fast internet response time, easy use of commands (open and close).  I strongly recommend the upgrade for anyone having trouble with the original unit.
Product has not worked.  It would synch once open the door and the lose it  Am returning

I love Love love this!!! It has made it where I don’t have to give my kids keys to the house to lose, nor ever give a key to anyone again. This has worked flawlessly since I bought It on cyber Monday. I also Love the security ofSeeing if my garage door is open from my phone.
If anyone is on the fence about purchasing / installing this.. don’t be !  Super super easy to install and the step by step guide on the app is extremely helpful and accurate.
Works great when detection say do not look at flash do not it will blind you for while i learned
Very good bargain, only took a few minutes to install and easily integrated with Alexa
Easy to install following instructions. Android app easy to follow & intuitive.
The video instructions are complete.  I encountered no difficulty matching this with my garage door openers.
Bought this for my mother in law. She can let us in the garage when she isn't at home by using her iphone. We like it a lot.
I love this. I do not use Alexa but as a remote opener it is great. I had to install a WiFi extender fir it to work. But once I did, it’s great.

I leave one of my cars outside and it had to use the remote garage door opener. Always felt uneasy about it, since all that someone had to do was break into my car and they had access to the garage. Now, I removed iremote from my car and just use my phone to open garage door.
Can not sated up. I have high speed internet and dosen't read my internet.  I not able to set it up

Easy set up and works great. Very nice to be able to use from anywhere.Only downside is that you can only have one user for this. What we do to work around this, is sharing the same login with everyone.

Directions were easy to follow and the app was easy to use. Just had an issue when trying to pair it to my garage door opener itself, it started to control it and I figured it was going to work just fine but ended up having to pair it two more times for it to finally pair correctly. Other than that, it's very easy to use and works just fine.

Great idea!.....But the sensor does not work properly. I get alerts saying the door is open when it is not. Had a feature set to close the door at 9pm if it was open. It would get confused and actually open the door. Not cool.
Very easy to install and the directions are easy to follow. Love the alerts telling the door is open and time it was opened. I wish it worked with Alexa.
Perfect for a  add on. Works great, no issues hooking up to router.
Installed on my garage door with ease so far no problems been a week so far we'll see. Keep you updated if any issues.
Installed on my garage door with ease so far no problems been a week so far we'll see. Keep you updated if any issues.
Works great! I just wish I could ask Alexa to close it or check the status of the door but other than that it’s great!
Doesn't integrate with Google Home, requires its own app, pretty annoying. Nest integration is also problematic. Over priced as well.
Love it.Now I don't have to cary my regular remote with me or leave ti in my vehicle.
The physical installation isn’t hard. The syncing is wonky. Mine is currently not working. Haven’t had time to try again over the holidays.

Wasted money as an add on that I purchased at same time I purchased the full package.Unable to just say "Alexa Open Garage Door".

This thing is great. I installed it in minuets. Downloaded the app. And programmed it following the step by step instructions on the app. I have an old genie with intelligent code I think series one and it works great. And the app is very user friendly and simple.

Watched the installation video and it was super easy. Took longer to gather the tools than it did to do the installation. I am so happy that when I wonder if I actually closed the garage when I left I don’t have to turn around! I can just check my phone!

This was so easy to install. I’ve used it a few times now for when I forgot my keys and to allow others to drop things by when we’re not at home. Convenient and handy device to have. Highly recommended.
Simple enough to install, worked perfectly. Not sure why some are having problems. App walks you through each step. Simple to connect and use.
No Alexa support!  Wouldn’t have bought it if I realized that up front. Afterwards I saw lots of commentary on the manufacturer pulling Alexa support
I no longer have to wonder if I closed the garage door, all I have to do is look on my iPhone.

This product is great. I had it installed and working within 15 minutes of opening the box. This is a basic unit and that’s what I like most about it.Within one hour of having it installed, I had to open the garage door when my 7 year old was on her way home from our neighbors.  I opened the garage from my phone from our upstairs bedroom.

Was a bit tricky to get set up and working.  The instructions were clear however the integration with  my android phone app  took some time to get working.  Once I figured it out,  the my Q  works well.
Works great most of the timeMaybe once a week it locks up and I can get in unless I reboot it
It works. I’m also able to use it with my Alexa without having to use ITTT or pay extra
this device has taken care of many things. I was not able to go run and leave the garage door open cause the opener was in the car, now I can open adn close from any where. love it

I ordered this “Amazon’s Choice” WiFi enabled garage door opener to operate with voice commands from Alexa.  It doesn’t work with Alexa!  Why would Amazon promote this item when it’s not functional with Amazon smart home products?  It also requires its own App to operate.
Cool wifi garage remote control. Now i can open and close it from anywhere
Works great and was easy to install

Incredibly easy to install. Everything is wireless and no extra wiring as needed. Very user-friendly system. I was able to integrate the system with home bridge and control my garage door withiOS home app and my Apple Watch.

Love this product and would buy again. No monthly fee as long as you use for opening your garage door only. A monthly fee may apply if you use with other automation. It's a great product and works GREAT.

This was a breeze to install.  I did not have difficulties pairing.  I have high ceilings in the garage and didn't have a ladder so I installed it on wall about 5 ft from the ground and it works with no issues.  I still bring my housekeys in the event if there is a power outage or if there is no internet connection from my service provider.

original ordered it thought it'll be very smart control for garage door. But later find out my garage door model not compatible to this smart device. So make sure check your garage door model if this device work with your door
The instructions were clear and included video clips. Time for the installation was under an hour.  The app on my phone worked the very first time.

One of the worst and most unreliable products around. Be ready to reset the sensor every 15 or so days that may include doing the entire setup again. Please DO NOT buy this, better products in market.
I love the product. I had to knock off one star because the setup was difficult. My internet provider assisted me, which is why I can now open and close my garage from my phone
Super easy to install and got the hub + 2 sensors installed in less than an hour.  App is simple to use and very convenient to control garage doors now.
I am the furthest from being handy and I found this was easy to install. Works great with the app and it’s nice to be able to check and make sure the garage is closed when away. Worth it.

Really easy to install and set up. Such a huge convenience. I can’t believe I waited so long to get this device.

Quite easy to install as there are no wires to be connected.  Takes less than 10 minutes to get this done by looking at online videos.  Alerts within 10 to 30 seconds of the activity occurring to my iphone.

Love this product. Works as described though I haven't tested it with Alexa.

I spent hours trying to pair this device to a Craftsman garage door opener. The door opener has an orange learn button. So I was using that option in the app. I called customer service and they looked up my model. She said to use the option for the purple learn button. I did that and it paired on the first try. I would recommend to call customer service if yours does not pair by the third try. Works great now!

I like that it lets me know when the door is opened or closed. I can open or close it from anywhere. It does what I need. My dad has one for two doors. If you ad an extra door sensor it is easy to set up an additional door.

Very useful.
Love the product so far! It was so easy to set up and so far, it is working! I am excited to use it

I actually rarely review things on Amazon, but this "opener" gave us so much hassle that I had to warn others about it.  If you are okay with this device functioning approximately 35% of the time as described then this is for you.  We purchased this after we left the garage door up accidentally and wanted something to warn us that we did not close it.  We got daily alerts that our garage door was up, when in fact it was closed.  However, one time it was accurate.  We got to where we ignored the alerts.  Furthermore, the app function on our smart phones worked less than half the time to close or open the door remotely.  So not only do you have a device that is a LIAR about whether or not the garage door is up, but even if it tells you the truth the app won't close the door from a remote location.  This was crap in every sense of the word.  Thanks to Amazon for easy returns.  We are trying a different brand with a camera and will hopefully have more success.

Not compatible with Genie 2028 door opener. This was unclear from research beforehand. Don't waste your money!Update: Gave it a second star since it does work even unpaired for monitoring, which means you can check in the app whether your garage door is open or closed. The main functionality of the opener (opening and closing) still does not work. If monitoring is worth ~$70 to you then perhaps this is worth it. Wish Genie and Chamberlain could figure this out!
Installed myself in under 30 minutes. Works well. Connected easily to wifi and my garage door opener. Great Prime Day buy at $29.99.
Gives us even more piece of mind! Had a package stolen a few weeks ago. Don't have to worry about that anymore!

Installation was easy. Works most of the time. Sometimes it doesn't sense that the garage door is closed. Once that happens, you can not use it to operate the door or to find out the status, until you use the real remote.
Great product
As advertised.

Doesn’t integrate with Alexa and it keeps opening the garage by itself. I called support and they were not helpful at all.
